options.name: Digital Copy of Freakshow Princess 🧟‍♀️
options.desc: Digital copy of Freakshow Princess added to your pledge! Written by Jonathan Hedrick with pencils & inks by Ben Worrell, colors by Sunil Ghagre and letters by CJ Jeffrey. Synopsis: "Jessica and her dog, Harley, are trapped inside of her boarded up house with a terrible threat growing outside. As the danger slowly increases, she thinks back to what got her in this situation and perhaps the threat is already inside her home!" For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Hyper/Aware 🚀
options.desc: Add a digital copy of the award winning comic book Hyper/Aware to your rewards! Written by Jonathan Hedrick with pencils, inks, colors, and letters by Debora Lancianese. Synopsis: "After three astronauts are stranded in deep space, they learn that only two of them will be able to enter hypersleep for the long return home. One of the crew members makes the difficult decision to remain awake and live the rest of his life alone with only the spacecraft's onboard A.I. for company. But when the other two astronauts wake up, they discover something horrible has happened while they were unconscious!" For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of KP Presents ArcticA🐻‍❄️
options.desc: Digital copy of Kerra Prime Presents ArcticA added to your pledge! Written by Jonathan Hedrick, art by Rom Silva, colors by Edgar Tavitas, and letters by Jerome Gagnon. Synopsis: "This action packed issue follows ArcticA as she escapes from the company that invested millions of dollars to create her and she finds herself in the wild. ArcticA happens to be roaming the same area of land that is know to be home to the creature known as Loggerhead and when these two meet, things could get out of hand!" For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of KP Presents Terry🧑🏼‍🚀
options.desc:
Digital copy of Kerra Prime Presents Terry added to your pledge! Written by Jonathan Hedrick & Bryan Silverbax, with art by Mark V, colors by Edgar Tavitas and letters by Jerome Gagnon. 
Synopsis: "Terry a farm fresh space academy grad who longs for nothing more than to get back to the love of his life. After he is teleported to a strange alien world for insubordination, he quickly realizes the punishment does not fit the crime. This is a one-shot NSFW alien-zombie space comedy for fans of Zombieland and The Orville!" For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Quicksand #1 ⏳
options.desc:
Add on a digital copy of Quicksand #1 (not the Scout edition) to your pledge!
Written by Jonathan Hedrick, pencils & inks by Debora Lancianese, colors by Sunil Ghagre, and letters by Cristian Docolomansky.
Synopsis: After a mysterious hole opens in the Egyptian desert, horrific creatures climb out and wreak havoc on a nearby city. They retreat as quickly as they arrived, leaving the planet in shock by this unfathomable event. A team of elite specialists from around the globe called "Canary One" are sent after the monsters to discover more about them. But when the crew never returns, the world must prepare for the possibility of another wave of attacks.
For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Quicksand #2 ⏳
options.desc:
Add on a digital copy of Quicksand #2 (not the Scout edition) to your pledge!
Written by Jonathan Hedrick, pencils & inks by Debora Lancianese, colors by Sunil Ghagre, and letters by Cristian Docolomansky.
Synopsis: A little over a year has passed since monsters crawled out of the sands near the Egyptian pyramids. Now the nearby military base echoes with sound of alarms as the creatures return to the surface once again. Stephanie Noon, wife of lost Canary One crew leader, is on the ground and ready to take action. But this time the monsters have brought something unexpected with them. For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Quicksand #3 ⏳
options.desc:
Add on a digital copy of Quicksand #3 (not the Scout edition) to your pledge!
Written by Jonathan Hedrick, pencils & inks by Debora Lancianese, colors by Sunil Ghagre, and letters by Cristian Docolomansky.
Synopsis: Immediately following the second wave of attacks from the underground monsters, Stephanie receives an order to begin preparing for another mission below the surface of the Earth. Before she starts assembling her team, she questions one of the original crew members of Canary One who was returned by the creatures. What he recounts of his time in the subterranean land is nothing short of warning to never go back down there!
For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of The Space Cadet 🌙
options.desc:
Add on a digital copy of this 20-paged all-ages story to your rewards!
Written by Jonathan Hedrick, artwork by Stefano Cardoselli, and letters by Joel Rodriguez.
Synopsis: "A child with big dreams of going to the Moon someday. One magical night, the youngster wakes up on the lunar surface! A friendly astronaut gives a tour of Earth's solitary satellite and teaches the importance of working hard to achieve your dreams."

options.name: Digital Copy of Hospice: The Scaled Key
options.desc:
Did you miss the 1st campaign of Hospice: Season 2? No worries! You can add on a digital copy with your pledge right now. 

Synopsis: "Alistair Redgrave, a generational demon hunter, loses his arm in hell while the only gateway back to Earth tries to close. He now is on the hunt to find demons that have managed to slip through splinters of what's left of the door. Capturing these demons gives him access to control them while regrowing his arm to finally shut the door to hell for good."

Written by Sean Wood, artwork by Rodrigo Catraca, and letters by Letter Squids.

options.name: Digital Copy of Brackish #1 🐊
options.desc:
Digital REMASTERED copy of Brackish #1 added to your pledge! Written by Jonathan Hedrick with artwork by Riccardo Faccini, colors by Ichsan Ansori and letters by Leo McGovern. Includes a lettered preview of Brackish #2!
Synopsis: "Two families have lived for generations on separate sides of a Florida swamp. The Tappers control the freshwater area where they make their moonshine and the Saltzman’s control the saltwater side from which their family fortune has grown from the abundant tourism. A truce was made a century ago to end their constant feud over the brackish part where their lands unite. But when the youngest Tapper son and youngest Saltzman daughter fall in love, the truce is broken and both sides of the swamp will never be the same again." For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Christmas in July #3 🎅
options.desc:
Digital copy of this 26-paged collection of 3 exclusive stories by some of the best creators in indie comics! For mature readers.
Featuring spooky holiday tales by Jonathan Hedrick, Hernán González. Phil Butehorn, Dan Buksa, Jimmy Gaspero, Fish Lee, Damir Rošić and Jerome Gagnon.

options.name: Digital Copy of Spillblood 🔥💀🔥
options.desc:
Add on a digital copy of Spillblood (Kickstarter Edition) to your pledge!
Written by Jonathan Hedrick, artwork by Stefano Cardoselli, and letters by Leo McGovern.
Synopsis: 36 pages of blood-splattered horror from the creative duo of Jonathan Hedrick (Can I Scream?) and Stefano Cardoselli (Don't Spit In The Wind)! Rejected by Heaven and exiled from Hell, a doomed priest walks the borderline between living and dead. He listens to those who cry to their deity for forgiveness. Then at night... he will spill blood!
For mature readers.

*Ships separate from other rewards.

options.name: Lifetime Subscription to My Substack 📧
options.desc:
Receive a lifetime paid subscription to Jonathan Hedrick's email newsletter on Substack! Get subscriber-only posts, audio editions and access to the full archive. Post comments, start threads in the chat, and join the community. Never miss an update on my latest projects!
No matter if the price goes up for others, you will never be charged again.
This is your investment in me and I would be eternally grateful for you believing in my success!

gone.name: Hospice: Tunnel of Love Digital Deluxe

A 24-page digital copy of the Tunnel of Love comic book, plus an inks-only PDF and a watermarked file of the script!

Included with all physical rewards.

Inks Only PDF of Tunnel of Love ✒️

options.name: Digital Copy of Capable: Harry's Day
options.desc: Add on the super limited 10-page ashcan (no longer in print) "Harry's Day" written by Jonathan Hedrick! This is a CAPABLE side story that takes place simultaneously with the first issue. For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Quicksand #0 ⏳
options.desc:
Add on this 8-page black & white digital ashcan of Quicksand #0 to your pledge!
Written by Jonathan Hedrick, artwork by Debora Lancianese, and letters by Cristian Docolomansky. For mature readers.
*This story takes place moments before the events of issue 1. Only 100 copies were printed.

options.name: Digital Copy of Atticus #1 in B&W 🖤🤍
options.desc: Add on a fully lettered black and white edition of Atticus & The Magical Pillow Fort #1 written by Jonathan Hedrick!

options.name: Digital Copy of Atticus & TMPF #1 🏰
options.desc:
Digital copy of Atticus & The Magical Pillow Fort #1 (in color) added to your pledge! Written by Jonathan Hedrick with artwork by Debora Lancianese, colors by Ichsan Ansori and letters/logo by Leo McGovern. 
Synopsis: "One rainy day, a little boy named Atticus is stuck inside the house with his grandmother. Nearly bored to tears after maxing out his daily allotted screentime, Atticus builds a pillow fort in the center of the living room. Before he enters the structure, his grandmother hands him a scavenger hunt on a folded piece of paper. She tells young Atticus that he must find all the items on that list before he can return. Atticus accepts the challenge and dives in! Soon after Atticus crawls inside the pillow fort, he realizes that something is very different!"

options.name: Digital Copy of Caffeinated Hearts ☕
options.desc:
Digital copy of Caffeinated Hearts added to your pledge! Written by Jonathan Hedrick with artwork by Stefano Cardoselli and letters by Jerome Gagnon. 
Synopsis: "Follow a beautifully tattooed barista named Amarella across four vignettes that are blended through this slice-of-life comic book set in a coffee shop with a cyberpunk backdrop. These robust tales will warm your heart like a fresh batch of java poured into your favorite morning mug. Step inside and enjoy!" For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Capable #1
options.desc:
Also written by Jonathan Hedrick!
Synopsis: "Derik Davidson is just an average high school kid. He's awkward, shy, bullied, and he uses a wheelchair. But one day Derik suddenly has the ability to run super fast! What will Derik do with his new power and what happens when more people wake up capable?!" For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Capable #2
options.desc:
Also written by Jonathan Hedrick!
Synopsis: "After experiencing a tragic loss, Derik doesn't have much time to dwell before he has to spring into action. The first bad-guy of the series is introduced and this man is fully armed! While Derik is hard at work saving the day, another person in his life learns of their own newly found superpower and it's a big eye opener." For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Capable #3
options.desc:
Also written by Jonathan Hedrick!
Synopsis: "Just as Derik thinks his life might start getting better now that he has superpowers, he's quickly reminded that it can't be that easy. As more people are discovering their new abilities, some are taking it to the extreme! Not everyone is happy with their changes and others have malicious plans." For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Capable #4
options.desc:
Also written by Jonathan Hedrick!
Synopsis: "Derik finally has it all: the girl, the powers, and the popularity. But someone is prepared to crush Derik’s joy by stopping him in his tracks and flipping his world upside down! Before the menace has time to celebrate his deadly act, a new villain enters the stage with a mysterious ability." For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Capable #5
options.desc:
Also written by Jonathan Hedrick!
Synopsis: "Angry and alone following another loss of a loved one, Derik finds himself reaching a breaking point. When it feels like it can’t get any worse, he comes face-to-face with a seemingly impossible enemy. Then the latest threat shows Derik just how deadly he can be." For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Capable #6
options.desc:
Also written by Jonathan Hedrick!
Synopsis: "A silence falls across the globe. Derik has lost his abilities. A vicious and all-powerful entity holds the world at its mercy. With hope seemingly lost, Derik pays a visit to a familiar face who gives him the spark he needs to save everyone." For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Capable #7
options.desc:
Also written by Jonathan Hedrick!
Synopsis: "Derik has been racing nonstop ever since he gained his superpower. Now he seems to be running out of road. In the end, he will have to make the most difficult decision of his life in order to save everyone else. But will his sacrifice be enough to rescue the entire world?" For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Freakshow Knight 🧟
options.desc:
Add on a digital copy of Freakshow Knight to your rewards! Written by Jonathan Hedrick with artwork by Stefano Cardoselli, letters by Cristian Docolomansky and edited by Chuck Pineau. For mature readers.
Synopsis: "During his time in prison, Red was surrounded by the worst types of people: thieves, rapists, and murderers. Now on the outside, he's surrounded by the living dead. Armed with the only thing he's ever known - violence - Red finds one last chance at redemption for a lifetime of sin."

Synopsis: "This action packed issue follows ArcticA as she escapes from the company that invested millions of dollars to create her and she finds herself in the wild. ArcticA happens to be roaming the same area of land that is know to be home to the creature known as Loggerhead and when these two meet, things could get out of hand!" For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of KP Presents Terry🧑🏼‍🚀
options.desc:
Digital copy of Kerra Prime Presents Terry added to your pledge! Written by Jonathan Hedrick & Bryan Silverbax, with art by Mark V, colors by Edgar Tavitas and letters by Jerome Gagnon. 
Synopsis: "Terry a farm fresh space academy grad who longs for nothing more than to get back to the love of his life. After he is teleported to a strange alien world for insubordination, he quickly realizes the punishment does not fit the crime. This is a one-shot NSFW alien-zombie space comedy for fans of Zombieland and The Orville!" For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Quicksand #1 ⏳
options.desc:
Add on a digital copy of Quicksand #1 (not the Scout edition) to your pledge!
Written by Jonathan Hedrick, pencils & inks by Debora Lancianese, colors by Sunil Ghagre, and letters by Cristian Docolomansky.
Synopsis: After a mysterious hole opens in the Egyptian desert, horrific creatures climb out and wreak havoc on a nearby city. They retreat as quickly as they arrived, leaving the planet in shock by this unfathomable event. A team of elite specialists from around the globe called "Canary One" are sent after the monsters to discover more about them. But when the crew never returns, the world must prepare for the possibility of another wave of attacks.
For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Quicksand #2 ⏳
options.desc:
Add on a digital copy of Quicksand #2 (not the Scout edition) to your pledge!
Written by Jonathan Hedrick, pencils & inks by Debora Lancianese, colors by Sunil Ghagre, and letters by Cristian Docolomansky.
Synopsis: A little over a year has passed since monsters crawled out of the sands near the Egyptian pyramids. Now the nearby military base echoes with sound of alarms as the creatures return to the surface once again. Stephanie Noon, wife of lost Canary One crew leader, is on the ground and ready to take action. But this time the monsters have brought something unexpected with them. For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Quicksand #3 ⏳
options.desc:
Add on a digital copy of Quicksand #3 (not the Scout edition) to your pledge!
Written by Jonathan Hedrick, pencils & inks by Debora Lancianese, colors by Sunil Ghagre, and letters by Cristian Docolomansky.
Synopsis: Immediately following the second wave of attacks from the underground monsters, Stephanie receives an order to begin preparing for another mission below the surface of the Earth. Before she starts assembling her team, she questions one of the original crew members of Canary One who was returned by the creatures. What he recounts of his time in the subterranean land is nothing short of warning to never go back down there!
For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of The Space Cadet 🌙
options.desc:
Add on a digital copy of this 20-paged all-ages story to your rewards!
Written by Jonathan Hedrick, artwork by Stefano Cardoselli, and letters by Joel Rodriguez.
Synopsis: "A child with big dreams of going to the Moon someday. One magical night, the youngster wakes up on the lunar surface! A friendly astronaut gives a tour of Earth's solitary satellite and teaches the importance of working hard to achieve your dreams."

options.name: Digital Copy of Hospice: The Scaled Key
options.desc:
Did you miss the 1st campaign of Hospice: Season 2? No worries! You can add on a digital copy with your pledge right now. 

Synopsis: "Alistair Redgrave, a generational demon hunter, loses his arm in hell while the only gateway back to Earth tries to close. He now is on the hunt to find demons that have managed to slip through splinters of what's left of the door. Capturing these demons gives him access to control them while regrowing his arm to finally shut the door to hell for good."

Written by Sean Wood, artwork by Rodrigo Catraca, and letters by Letter Squids.

options.name: Digital Copy of Brackish #1 🐊
options.desc:
Digital REMASTERED copy of Brackish #1 added to your pledge! Written by Jonathan Hedrick with artwork by Riccardo Faccini, colors by Ichsan Ansori and letters by Leo McGovern. Includes a lettered preview of Brackish #2!
Synopsis: "Two families have lived for generations on separate sides of a Florida swamp. The Tappers control the freshwater area where they make their moonshine and the Saltzman’s control the saltwater side from which their family fortune has grown from the abundant tourism. A truce was made a century ago to end their constant feud over the brackish part where their lands unite. But when the youngest Tapper son and youngest Saltzman daughter fall in love, the truce is broken and both sides of the swamp will never be the same again." For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Christmas in July #3 🎅
options.desc:
Digital copy of this 26-paged collection of 3 exclusive stories by some of the best creators in indie comics! For mature readers.
Featuring spooky holiday tales by Jonathan Hedrick, Hernán González. Phil Butehorn, Dan Buksa, Jimmy Gaspero, Fish Lee, Damir Rošić and Jerome Gagnon.

options.name: Digital Copy of Spillblood 🔥💀🔥
options.desc:
Add on a digital copy of Spillblood (Kickstarter Edition) to your pledge!
Written by Jonathan Hedrick, artwork by Stefano Cardoselli, and letters by Leo McGovern.
Synopsis: 36 pages of blood-splattered horror from the creative duo of Jonathan Hedrick (Can I Scream?) and Stefano Cardoselli (Don't Spit In The Wind)! Rejected by Heaven and exiled from Hell, a doomed priest walks the borderline between living and dead. He listens to those who cry to their deity for forgiveness. Then at night... he will spill blood!
For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Atticus #1 in B&W 🖤🤍
options.desc: Add on a fully lettered black and white edition of Atticus & The Magical Pillow Fort #1 written by Jonathan Hedrick!

options.name: Digital Copy of Atticus & TMPF #1 🏰
options.desc:
Digital copy of Atticus & The Magical Pillow Fort #1 (in color) added to your pledge! Written by Jonathan Hedrick with artwork by Debora Lancianese, colors by Ichsan Ansori and letters/logo by Leo McGovern. 
Synopsis: "One rainy day, a little boy named Atticus is stuck inside the house with his grandmother. Nearly bored to tears after maxing out his daily allotted screentime, Atticus builds a pillow fort in the center of the living room. Before he enters the structure, his grandmother hands him a scavenger hunt on a folded piece of paper. She tells young Atticus that he must find all the items on that list before he can return. Atticus accepts the challenge and dives in! Soon after Atticus crawls inside the pillow fort, he realizes that something is very different!"

options.name: Digital Copy of Caffeinated Hearts ☕
options.desc:
Digital copy of Caffeinated Hearts added to your pledge! Written by Jonathan Hedrick with artwork by Stefano Cardoselli and letters by Jerome Gagnon. 
Synopsis: "Follow a beautifully tattooed barista named Amarella across four vignettes that are blended through this slice-of-life comic book set in a coffee shop with a cyberpunk backdrop. These robust tales will warm your heart like a fresh batch of java poured into your favorite morning mug. Step inside and enjoy!" For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Capable #1
options.desc:
Also written by Jonathan Hedrick!
Synopsis: "Derik Davidson is just an average high school kid. He's awkward, shy, bullied, and he uses a wheelchair. But one day Derik suddenly has the ability to run super fast! What will Derik do with his new power and what happens when more people wake up capable?!" For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Capable #2
options.desc:
Also written by Jonathan Hedrick!
Synopsis: "After experiencing a tragic loss, Derik doesn't have much time to dwell before he has to spring into action. The first bad-guy of the series is introduced and this man is fully armed! While Derik is hard at work saving the day, another person in his life learns of their own newly found superpower and it's a big eye opener." For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Capable #3
options.desc:
Also written by Jonathan Hedrick!
Synopsis: "Just as Derik thinks his life might start getting better now that he has superpowers, he's quickly reminded that it can't be that easy. As more people are discovering their new abilities, some are taking it to the extreme! Not everyone is happy with their changes and others have malicious plans." For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Capable #4
options.desc:
Also written by Jonathan Hedrick!
Synopsis: "Derik finally has it all: the girl, the powers, and the popularity. But someone is prepared to crush Derik’s joy by stopping him in his tracks and flipping his world upside down! Before the menace has time to celebrate his deadly act, a new villain enters the stage with a mysterious ability." For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Capable #5
options.desc:
Also written by Jonathan Hedrick!
Synopsis: "Angry and alone following another loss of a loved one, Derik finds himself reaching a breaking point. When it feels like it can’t get any worse, he comes face-to-face with a seemingly impossible enemy. Then the latest threat shows Derik just how deadly he can be." For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Capable #6
options.desc:
Also written by Jonathan Hedrick!
Synopsis: "A silence falls across the globe. Derik has lost his abilities. A vicious and all-powerful entity holds the world at its mercy. With hope seemingly lost, Derik pays a visit to a familiar face who gives him the spark he needs to save everyone." For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Capable #7
options.desc:
Also written by Jonathan Hedrick!
Synopsis: "Derik has been racing nonstop ever since he gained his superpower. Now he seems to be running out of road. In the end, he will have to make the most difficult decision of his life in order to save everyone else. But will his sacrifice be enough to rescue the entire world?" For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Freakshow Knight 🧟
options.desc:
Add on a digital copy of Freakshow Knight to your rewards! Written by Jonathan Hedrick with artwork by Stefano Cardoselli, letters by Cristian Docolomansky and edited by Chuck Pineau. For mature readers.
Synopsis: "During his time in prison, Red was surrounded by the worst types of people: thieves, rapists, and murderers. Now on the outside, he's surrounded by the living dead. Armed with the only thing he's ever known - violence - Red finds one last chance at redemption for a lifetime of sin."

options.name: Digital Copy of Freakshow Princess 🧟‍♀️
options.desc: Digital copy of Freakshow Princess added to your pledge! Written by Jonathan Hedrick with pencils & inks by Ben Worrell, colors by Sunil Ghagre and letters by CJ Jeffrey. Synopsis: "Jessica and her dog, Harley, are trapped inside of her boarded up house with a terrible threat growing outside. As the danger slowly increases, she thinks back to what got her in this situation and perhaps the threat is already inside her home!" For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Hyper/Aware 🚀
options.desc: Add a digital copy of the award winning comic book Hyper/Aware to your rewards! Written by Jonathan Hedrick with pencils, inks, colors, and letters by Debora Lancianese. Synopsis: "After three astronauts are stranded in deep space, they learn that only two of them will be able to enter hypersleep for the long return home. One of the crew members makes the difficult decision to remain awake and live the rest of his life alone with only the spacecraft's onboard A.I. for company. But when the other two astronauts wake up, they discover something horrible has happened while they were unconscious!" For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Quicksand #1 ⏳
options.desc:
Add on a digital copy of Quicksand #1 (not the Scout edition) to your pledge!
Written by Jonathan Hedrick, pencils & inks by Debora Lancianese, colors by Sunil Ghagre, and letters by Cristian Docolomansky.
Synopsis: After a mysterious hole opens in the Egyptian desert, horrific creatures climb out and wreak havoc on a nearby city. They retreat as quickly as they arrived, leaving the planet in shock by this unfathomable event. A team of elite specialists from around the globe called "Canary One" are sent after the monsters to discover more about them. But when the crew never returns, the world must prepare for the possibility of another wave of attacks.
For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Quicksand #2 ⏳
options.desc:
Add on a digital copy of Quicksand #2 (not the Scout edition) to your pledge!
Written by Jonathan Hedrick, pencils & inks by Debora Lancianese, colors by Sunil Ghagre, and letters by Cristian Docolomansky.
Synopsis: A little over a year has passed since monsters crawled out of the sands near the Egyptian pyramids. Now the nearby military base echoes with sound of alarms as the creatures return to the surface once again. Stephanie Noon, wife of lost Canary One crew leader, is on the ground and ready to take action. But this time the monsters have brought something unexpected with them. For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Quicksand #3 ⏳
options.desc:
Add on a digital copy of Quicksand #3 (not the Scout edition) to your pledge!
Written by Jonathan Hedrick, pencils & inks by Debora Lancianese, colors by Sunil Ghagre, and letters by Cristian Docolomansky.
Synopsis: Immediately following the second wave of attacks from the underground monsters, Stephanie receives an order to begin preparing for another mission below the surface of the Earth. Before she starts assembling her team, she questions one of the original crew members of Canary One who was returned by the creatures. What he recounts of his time in the subterranean land is nothing short of warning to never go back down there!
For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of The Space Cadet 🌙

options.name: Digital Copy of Hospice: The Scaled Key
options.desc:

Synopsis: "Alistair Redgrave, a generational demon hunter, loses his arm in hell while the only gateway back to Earth tries to close. He now is on the hunt to find demons that have managed to slip through splinters of what's left of the door. Capturing these demons gives him access to control them while regrowing his arm to finally shut the door to hell for good."

Written by Sean Wood, artwork by Rodrigo Catraca, and letters by Letter Squids.

options.name: Digital Copy of Brackish #1 🐊

Synopsis: "Two families have lived for generations on separate sides of a Florida swamp. The Tappers control the freshwater area where they make their moonshine and the Saltzman’s control the saltwater side from which their family fortune has grown from the abundant tourism. A truce was made a century ago to end their constant feud over the brackish part where their lands unite. But when the youngest Tapper son and youngest Saltzman daughter fall in love, the truce is broken and both sides of the swamp will never be the same again." For mature readers.

ArcticA happens to be roaming the same area of land that is know to be home to the creature known as Loggerhead and when these two meet, things could get out of hand!" For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of KP Presents Terry🧑🏼‍🚀
options.desc:
Digital copy of Kerra Prime Presents Terry added to your pledge! Written by Jonathan Hedrick & Bryan Silverbax, with art by Mark V, colors by Edgar Tavitas and letters by Jerome Gagnon. 
Synopsis: "Terry a farm fresh space academy grad who longs for nothing more than to get back to the love of his life. After he is teleported to a strange alien world for insubordination, he quickly realizes the punishment does not fit the crime. This is a one-shot NSFW alien-zombie space comedy for fans of Zombieland and The Orville!" For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Quicksand #1 ⏳
options.desc:
Add on a digital copy of Quicksand #1 (not the Scout edition) to your pledge!
Written by Jonathan Hedrick, pencils & inks by Debora Lancianese, colors by Sunil Ghagre, and letters by Cristian Docolomansky.
Synopsis: After a mysterious hole opens in the Egyptian desert, horrific creatures climb out and wreak havoc on a nearby city. They retreat as quickly as they arrived, leaving the planet in shock by this unfathomable event. A team of elite specialists from around the globe called "Canary One" are sent after the monsters to discover more about them. But when the crew never returns, the world must prepare for the possibility of another wave of attacks.
For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Quicksand #2 ⏳
options.desc:
Add on a digital copy of Quicksand #2 (not the Scout edition) to your pledge!
Written by Jonathan Hedrick, pencils & inks by Debora Lancianese, colors by Sunil Ghagre, and letters by Cristian Docolomansky.
Synopsis: A little over a year has passed since monsters crawled out of the sands near the Egyptian pyramids. Now the nearby military base echoes with sound of alarms as the creatures return to the surface once again. Stephanie Noon, wife of lost Canary One crew leader, is on the ground and ready to take action. But this time the monsters have brought something unexpected with them. For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Quicksand #3 ⏳
options.desc:
Add on a digital copy of Quicksand #3 (not the Scout edition) to your pledge!
Written by Jonathan Hedrick, pencils & inks by Debora Lancianese, colors by Sunil Ghagre, and letters by Cristian Docolomansky.
Synopsis: Immediately following the second wave of attacks from the underground monsters, Stephanie receives an order to begin preparing for another mission below the surface of the Earth. Before she starts assembling her team, she questions one of the original crew members of Canary One who was returned by the creatures. What he recounts of his time in the subterranean land is nothing short of warning to never go back down there!
For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of The Space Cadet 🌙
options.desc:
Add on a digital copy of this 20-paged all-ages story to your rewards!
Written by Jonathan Hedrick, artwork by Stefano Cardoselli, and letters by Joel Rodriguez.
Synopsis: "A child with big dreams of going to the Moon someday. One magical night, the youngster wakes up on the lunar surface! A friendly astronaut gives a tour of Earth's solitary satellite and teaches the importance of working hard to achieve your dreams."

options.name: Digital Copy of Hospice: The Scaled Key
options.desc:
Did you miss the 1st campaign of Hospice: Season 2? No worries! You can add on a digital copy with your pledge right now. 

Synopsis: "Alistair Redgrave, a generational demon hunter, loses his arm in hell while the only gateway back to Earth tries to close. He now is on the hunt to find demons that have managed to slip through splinters of what's left of the door. Capturing these demons gives him access to control them while regrowing his arm to finally shut the door to hell for good."

Written by Sean Wood, artwork by Rodrigo Catraca, and letters by Letter Squids.

options.name: Digital Copy of Brackish #1 🐊
options.desc:
Digital REMASTERED copy of Brackish #1 added to your pledge! Written by Jonathan Hedrick with artwork by Riccardo Faccini, colors by Ichsan Ansori and letters by Leo McGovern. Includes a lettered preview of Brackish #2!
Synopsis: "Two families have lived for generations on separate sides of a Florida swamp. The Tappers control the freshwater area where they make their moonshine and the Saltzman’s control the saltwater side from which their family fortune has grown from the abundant tourism. A truce was made a century ago to end their constant feud over the brackish part where their lands unite. But when the youngest Tapper son and youngest Saltzman daughter fall in love, the truce is broken and both sides of the swamp will never be the same again." For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Christmas in July #3 🎅
options.desc:
Digital copy of this 26-paged collection of 3 exclusive stories by some of the best creators in indie comics! For mature readers.
Featuring spooky holiday tales by Jonathan Hedrick, Hernán González. Phil Butehorn, Dan Buksa, Jimmy Gaspero, Fish Lee, Damir Rošić and Jerome Gagnon.

options.name: Digital Copy of Spillblood 🔥💀🔥
options.desc:
Add on a digital copy of Spillblood (Kickstarter Edition) to your pledge!
Written by Jonathan Hedrick, artwork by Stefano Cardoselli, and letters by Leo McGovern.
Synopsis: 36 pages of blood-splattered horror from the creative duo of Jonathan Hedrick (Can I Scream?) and Stefano Cardoselli (Don't Spit In The Wind)! Rejected by Heaven and exiled from Hell, a doomed priest walks the borderline between living and dead. He listens to those who cry to their deity for forgiveness. Then at night... he will spill blood!
For mature readers.

options.name: Hospice Volume 1 Digital TPB

options.name: Lifetime Subscription to My Substack 📧
options.desc:
Receive a lifetime paid subscription to Jonathan Hedrick's email newsletter on Substack! Get subscriber-only posts, audio editions and access to the full archive. Post comments, start threads in the chat, and join the community. Never miss an update on my latest projects!
No matter if the price goes up for others, you will never be charged again.
This is your investment in me and I would be eternally grateful for you believing in my success!

Digital copy of Atticus & The Magical Pillow Fort #1 (in color) added to your pledge! Written by Jonathan Hedrick with artwork by Debora Lancianese, colors by Ichsan Ansori and letters/logo by Leo McGovern. 
Synopsis: "One rainy day, a little boy named Atticus is stuck inside the house with his grandmother. Nearly bored to tears after maxing out his daily allotted screentime, Atticus builds a pillow fort in the center of the living room. Before he enters the structure, his grandmother hands him a scavenger hunt on a folded piece of paper. She tells young Atticus that he must find all the items on that list before he can return. Atticus accepts the challenge and dives in! Soon after Atticus crawls inside the pillow fort, he realizes that something is very different!"

options.name: Digital Copy of Caffeinated Hearts ☕
options.desc:
Digital copy of Caffeinated Hearts added to your pledge! Written by Jonathan Hedrick with artwork by Stefano Cardoselli and letters by Jerome Gagnon. 
Synopsis: "Follow a beautifully tattooed barista named Amarella across four vignettes that are blended through this slice-of-life comic book set in a coffee shop with a cyberpunk backdrop. These robust tales will warm your heart like a fresh batch of java poured into your favorite morning mug. Step inside and enjoy!" For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Capable #1
options.desc:
Also written by Jonathan Hedrick!
Synopsis: "Derik Davidson is just an average high school kid. He's awkward, shy, bullied, and he uses a wheelchair. But one day Derik suddenly has the ability to run super fast! What will Derik do with his new power and what happens when more people wake up capable?!" For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Capable #2
options.desc:
Also written by Jonathan Hedrick!
Synopsis: "After experiencing a tragic loss, Derik doesn't have much time to dwell before he has to spring into action. The first bad-guy of the series is introduced and this man is fully armed! While Derik is hard at work saving the day, another person in his life learns of their own newly found superpower and it's a big eye opener." For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Capable #3
options.desc:
Also written by Jonathan Hedrick!
Synopsis: "Just as Derik thinks his life might start getting better now that he has superpowers, he's quickly reminded that it can't be that easy. As more people are discovering their new abilities, some are taking it to the extreme! Not everyone is happy with their changes and others have malicious plans." For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Capable #4
options.desc:
Also written by Jonathan Hedrick!
Synopsis: "Derik finally has it all: the girl, the powers, and the popularity. But someone is prepared to crush Derik’s joy by stopping him in his tracks and flipping his world upside down! Before the menace has time to celebrate his deadly act, a new villain enters the stage with a mysterious ability." For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Capable #5
options.desc:
Also written by Jonathan Hedrick!
Synopsis: "Angry and alone following another loss of a loved one, Derik finds himself reaching a breaking point. When it feels like it can’t get any worse, he comes face-to-face with a seemingly impossible enemy. Then the latest threat shows Derik just how deadly he can be." For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Capable #6
options.desc:
Also written by Jonathan Hedrick!
Synopsis: "A silence falls across the globe. Derik has lost his abilities. A vicious and all-powerful entity holds the world at its mercy. With hope seemingly lost, Derik pays a visit to a familiar face who gives him the spark he needs to save everyone." For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Capable #7
options.desc:
Also written by Jonathan Hedrick!
Synopsis: "Derik has been racing nonstop ever since he gained his superpower. Now he seems to be running out of road. In the end, he will have to make the most difficult decision of his life in order to save everyone else. But will his sacrifice be enough to rescue the entire world?" For mature readers.

Add on a digital copy of Freakshow Knight to your rewards! Written by Jonathan Hedrick with artwork by Stefano Cardoselli, letters by Cristian Docolomansky and edited by Chuck Pineau. For mature readers.

Written by Jonathan Hedrick, pencils & inks by Debora Lancianese, colors by Sunil Ghagre, and letters by Cristian Docolomansky.
Synopsis: After a mysterious hole opens in the Egyptian desert, horrific creatures climb out and wreak havoc on a nearby city. They retreat as quickly as they arrived, leaving the planet in shock by this unfathomable event. A team of elite specialists from around the globe called "Canary One" are sent after the monsters to discover more about them. But when the crew never returns, the world must prepare for the possibility of another wave of attacks.
For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Quicksand #2 ⏳
options.desc:
Add on a digital copy of Quicksand #2 (not the Scout edition) to your pledge!
Written by Jonathan Hedrick, pencils & inks by Debora Lancianese, colors by Sunil Ghagre, and letters by Cristian Docolomansky.
Synopsis: A little over a year has passed since monsters crawled out of the sands near the Egyptian pyramids. Now the nearby military base echoes with sound of alarms as the creatures return to the surface once again. Stephanie Noon, wife of lost Canary One crew leader, is on the ground and ready to take action. But this time the monsters have brought something unexpected with them. For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Quicksand #3 ⏳
options.desc:
Add on a digital copy of Quicksand #3 (not the Scout edition) to your pledge!
Written by Jonathan Hedrick, pencils & inks by Debora Lancianese, colors by Sunil Ghagre, and letters by Cristian Docolomansky.
Synopsis: Immediately following the second wave of attacks from the underground monsters, Stephanie receives an order to begin preparing for another mission below the surface of the Earth. Before she starts assembling her team, she questions one of the original crew members of Canary One who was returned by the creatures. What he recounts of his time in the subterranean land is nothing short of warning to never go back down there!
For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of The Space Cadet 🌙
options.desc:
Add on a digital copy of this 20-paged all-ages story to your rewards!
Written by Jonathan Hedrick, artwork by Stefano Cardoselli, and letters by Joel Rodriguez.
Synopsis: "A child with big dreams of going to the Moon someday. One magical night, the youngster wakes up on the lunar surface! A friendly astronaut gives a tour of Earth's solitary satellite and teaches the importance of working hard to achieve your dreams."

options.name: Digital Copy of Hospice: The Scaled Key
options.desc:
Did you miss the 1st campaign of Hospice: Season 2? No worries! You can add on a digital copy with your pledge right now. 

Synopsis: "Alistair Redgrave, a generational demon hunter, loses his arm in hell while the only gateway back to Earth tries to close. He now is on the hunt to find demons that have managed to slip through splinters of what's left of the door. Capturing these demons gives him access to control them while regrowing his arm to finally shut the door to hell for good."

Written by Sean Wood, artwork by Rodrigo Catraca, and letters by Letter Squids.

options.name: Digital Copy of Brackish #1 🐊

Digital REMASTERED copy of Brackish #1 added to your pledge! Written by Jonathan Hedrick with artwork by Riccardo Faccini, colors by Ichsan Ansori and letters by Leo McGovern. Includes a lettered preview of Brackish #2!
Synopsis: "Two families have lived for generations on separate sides of a Florida swamp. The Tappers control the freshwater area where they make their moonshine and the Saltzman’s control the saltwater side from which their family fortune has grown from the abundant tourism. A truce was made a century ago to end their constant feud over the brackish part where their lands unite. But when the youngest Tapper son and youngest Saltzman daughter fall in love, the truce is broken and both sides of the swamp will never be the same again." For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Christmas in July #3 🎅

options.name: Digital Copy of Atticus #1 in B&W 🖤🤍
options.desc: Add on a fully lettered black and white edition of Atticus & The Magical Pillow Fort #1 written by Jonathan Hedrick!

options.name: Digital Copy of Atticus & TMPF #1 🏰
options.desc:
Digital copy of Atticus & The Magical Pillow Fort #1 (in color) added to your pledge! Written by Jonathan Hedrick with artwork by Debora Lancianese, colors by Ichsan Ansori and letters/logo by Leo McGovern. 
Synopsis: "One rainy day, a little boy named Atticus is stuck inside the house with his grandmother. Nearly bored to tears after maxing out his daily allotted screentime, Atticus builds a pillow fort in the center of the living room. Before he enters the structure, his grandmother hands him a scavenger hunt on a folded piece of paper. She tells young Atticus that he must find all the items on that list before he can return. Atticus accepts the challenge and dives in! Soon after Atticus crawls inside the pillow fort, he realizes that something is very different!"

options.name: Digital Copy of Caffeinated Hearts ☕
options.desc:
Digital copy of Caffeinated Hearts added to your pledge! Written by Jonathan Hedrick with artwork by Stefano Cardoselli and letters by Jerome Gagnon. 
Synopsis: "Follow a beautifully tattooed barista named Amarella across four vignettes that are blended through this slice-of-life comic book set in a coffee shop with a cyberpunk backdrop. These robust tales will warm your heart like a fresh batch of java poured into your favorite morning mug. Step inside and enjoy!" For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Capable #1
options.desc:
Also written by Jonathan Hedrick!
Synopsis: "Derik Davidson is just an average high school kid. He's awkward, shy, bullied, and he uses a wheelchair. But one day Derik suddenly has the ability to run super fast! What will Derik do with his new power and what happens when more people wake up capable?!" For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Capable #2
options.desc:
Also written by Jonathan Hedrick!
Synopsis: "After experiencing a tragic loss, Derik doesn't have much time to dwell before he has to spring into action. The first bad-guy of the series is introduced and this man is fully armed! While Derik is hard at work saving the day, another person in his life learns of their own newly found superpower and it's a big eye opener." For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Capable #3
options.desc:
Also written by Jonathan Hedrick!
Synopsis: "Just as Derik thinks his life might start getting better now that he has superpowers, he's quickly reminded that it can't be that easy. As more people are discovering their new abilities, some are taking it to the extreme! Not everyone is happy with their changes and others have malicious plans." For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Capable #4
options.desc:
Also written by Jonathan Hedrick!
Synopsis: "Derik finally has it all: the girl, the powers, and the popularity. But someone is prepared to crush Derik’s joy by stopping him in his tracks and flipping his world upside down! Before the menace has time to celebrate his deadly act, a new villain enters the stage with a mysterious ability." For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Capable #5
options.desc:
Also written by Jonathan Hedrick!
Synopsis: "Angry and alone following another loss of a loved one, Derik finds himself reaching a breaking point. When it feels like it can’t get any worse, he comes face-to-face with a seemingly impossible enemy. Then the latest threat shows Derik just how deadly he can be." For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Capable #6
options.desc:
Also written by Jonathan Hedrick!
Synopsis: "A silence falls across the globe. Derik has lost his abilities. A vicious and all-powerful entity holds the world at its mercy. With hope seemingly lost, Derik pays a visit to a familiar face who gives him the spark he needs to save everyone." For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Capable #7
options.desc:
Also written by Jonathan Hedrick!
Synopsis: "Derik has been racing nonstop ever since he gained his superpower. Now he seems to be running out of road. In the end, he will have to make the most difficult decision of his life in order to save everyone else. But will his sacrifice be enough to rescue the entire world?" For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Freakshow Knight 🧟
options.desc:
Add on a digital copy of Freakshow Knight to your rewards! Written by Jonathan Hedrick with artwork by Stefano Cardoselli, letters by Cristian Docolomansky and edited by Chuck Pineau. For mature readers.
Synopsis: "During his time in prison, Red was surrounded by the worst types of people: thieves, rapists, and murderers. Now on the outside, he's surrounded by the living dead. Armed with the only thing he's ever known - violence - Red finds one last chance at redemption for a lifetime of sin."

options.name: Digital Copy of Freakshow Princess 🧟‍♀️
options.desc: Digital copy of Freakshow Princess added to your pledge! Written by Jonathan Hedrick with pencils & inks by Ben Worrell, colors by Sunil Ghagre and letters by CJ Jeffrey. Synopsis: "Jessica and her dog, Harley, are trapped inside of her boarded up house with a terrible threat growing outside. As the danger slowly increases, she thinks back to what got her in this situation and perhaps the threat is already inside her home!" For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Hyper/Aware 🚀
options.desc: Add a digital copy of the award winning comic book Hyper/Aware to your rewards! Written by Jonathan Hedrick with pencils, inks, colors, and letters by Debora Lancianese. Synopsis: "After three astronauts are stranded in deep space, they learn that only two of them will be able to enter hypersleep for the long return home. One of the crew members makes the difficult decision to remain awake and live the rest of his life alone with only the spacecraft's onboard A.I. for company. But when the other two astronauts wake up, they discover something horrible has happened while they were unconscious!" For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of KP Presents ArcticA🐻‍❄️
options.desc: Digital copy of Kerra Prime Presents ArcticA added to your pledge! Written by Jonathan Hedrick, art by Rom Silva, colors by Edgar Tavitas, and letters by Jerome Gagnon. Synopsis: "This action packed issue follows ArcticA as she escapes from the company that invested millions of dollars to create her and she finds herself in the wild. ArcticA happens to be roaming the same area of land that is know to be home to the creature known as Loggerhead and when these two meet, things could get out of hand!" For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of KP Presents Terry🧑🏼‍🚀
options.desc:
Digital copy of Kerra Prime Presents Terry added to your pledge! Written by Jonathan Hedrick & Bryan Silverbax, with art by Mark V, colors by Edgar Tavitas and letters by Jerome Gagnon. 
Synopsis: "Terry a farm fresh space academy grad who longs for nothing more than to get back to the love of his life. After he is teleported to a strange alien world for insubordination, he quickly realizes the punishment does not fit the crime. This is a one-shot NSFW alien-zombie space comedy for fans of Zombieland and The Orville!" For mature readers.

ArcticA happens to be roaming the same area of land that is know to be home to the creature known as Loggerhead and when these two meet, things could get out of hand!" For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of KP Presents Terry🧑🏼‍🚀
options.desc:
Digital copy of Kerra Prime Presents Terry added to your pledge! Written by Jonathan Hedrick & Bryan Silverbax, with art by Mark V, colors by Edgar Tavitas and letters by Jerome Gagnon. 
Synopsis: "Terry a farm fresh space academy grad who longs for nothing more than to get back to the love of his life. After he is teleported to a strange alien world for insubordination, he quickly realizes the punishment does not fit the crime. This is a one-shot NSFW alien-zombie space comedy for fans of Zombieland and The Orville!" For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Quicksand #1 ⏳
options.desc:
Add on a digital copy of Quicksand #1 (not the Scout edition) to your pledge!
Written by Jonathan Hedrick, pencils & inks by Debora Lancianese, colors by Sunil Ghagre, and letters by Cristian Docolomansky.
Synopsis: After a mysterious hole opens in the Egyptian desert, horrific creatures climb out and wreak havoc on a nearby city. They retreat as quickly as they arrived, leaving the planet in shock by this unfathomable event. A team of elite specialists from around the globe called "Canary One" are sent after the monsters to discover more about them. But when the crew never returns, the world must prepare for the possibility of another wave of attacks.
For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Quicksand #2 ⏳
options.desc:
Add on a digital copy of Quicksand #2 (not the Scout edition) to your pledge!
Written by Jonathan Hedrick, pencils & inks by Debora Lancianese, colors by Sunil Ghagre, and letters by Cristian Docolomansky.
Synopsis: A little over a year has passed since monsters crawled out of the sands near the Egyptian pyramids. Now the nearby military base echoes with sound of alarms as the creatures return to the surface once again. Stephanie Noon, wife of lost Canary One crew leader, is on the ground and ready to take action. But this time the monsters have brought something unexpected with them. For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Quicksand #3 ⏳
options.desc:
Add on a digital copy of Quicksand #3 (not the Scout edition) to your pledge!
Written by Jonathan Hedrick, pencils & inks by Debora Lancianese, colors by Sunil Ghagre, and letters by Cristian Docolomansky.
Synopsis: Immediately following the second wave of attacks from the underground monsters, Stephanie receives an order to begin preparing for another mission below the surface of the Earth. Before she starts assembling her team, she questions one of the original crew members of Canary One who was returned by the creatures. What he recounts of his time in the subterranean land is nothing short of warning to never go back down there!
For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of The Space Cadet 🌙
options.desc:
Add on a digital copy of this 20-paged all-ages story to your rewards!
Written by Jonathan Hedrick, artwork by Stefano Cardoselli, and letters by Joel Rodriguez.
Synopsis: "A child with big dreams of going to the Moon someday. One magical night, the youngster wakes up on the lunar surface! A friendly astronaut gives a tour of Earth's solitary satellite and teaches the importance of working hard to achieve your dreams."

options.name: Digital Copy of Hospice: The Scaled Key
options.desc:
Did you miss the 1st campaign of Hospice: Season 2? No worries! You can add on a digital copy with your pledge right now. 

Synopsis: "Alistair Redgrave, a generational demon hunter, loses his arm in hell while the only gateway back to Earth tries to close. He now is on the hunt to find demons that have managed to slip through splinters of what's left of the door. Capturing these demons gives him access to control them while regrowing his arm to finally shut the door to hell for good."

Written by Sean Wood, artwork by Rodrigo Catraca, and letters by Letter Squids.

options.name: Digital Copy of Brackish #1 🐊
options.desc:
Digital REMASTERED copy of Brackish #1 added to your pledge! Written by Jonathan Hedrick with artwork by Riccardo Faccini, colors by Ichsan Ansori and letters by Leo McGovern. Includes a lettered preview of Brackish #2!
Synopsis: "Two families have lived for generations on separate sides of a Florida swamp. The Tappers control the freshwater area where they make their moonshine and the Saltzman’s control the saltwater side from which their family fortune has grown from the abundant tourism. A truce was made a century ago to end their constant feud over the brackish part where their lands unite. But when the youngest Tapper son and youngest Saltzman daughter fall in love, the truce is broken and both sides of the swamp will never be the same again." For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Christmas in July #3 🎅
options.desc:
Digital copy of this 26-paged collection of 3 exclusive stories by some of the best creators in indie comics! For mature readers.
Featuring spooky holiday tales by Jonathan Hedrick, Hernán González. Phil Butehorn, Dan Buksa, Jimmy Gaspero, Fish Lee, Damir Rošić and Jerome Gagnon.

options.name: Digital Copy of Spillblood 🔥💀🔥
options.desc:
Add on a digital copy of Spillblood (Kickstarter Edition) to your pledge!
Written by Jonathan Hedrick, artwork by Stefano Cardoselli, and letters by Leo McGovern.
Synopsis: 36 pages of blood-splattered horror from the creative duo of Jonathan Hedrick (Can I Scream?) and Stefano Cardoselli (Don't Spit In The Wind)! Rejected by Heaven and exiled from Hell, a doomed priest walks the borderline between living and dead. He listens to those who cry to their deity for forgiveness. Then at night... he will spill blood!
For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Atticus #1 in B&W 🖤🤍
options.desc: Add on a fully lettered black and white edition of Atticus & The Magical Pillow Fort #1 written by Jonathan Hedrick!

options.name: Digital Copy of Atticus & TMPF #1 🏰
options.desc:
Digital copy of Atticus & The Magical Pillow Fort #1 (in color) added to your pledge! Written by Jonathan Hedrick with artwork by Debora Lancianese, colors by Ichsan Ansori and letters/logo by Leo McGovern. 
Synopsis: "One rainy day, a little boy named Atticus is stuck inside the house with his grandmother. Nearly bored to tears after maxing out his daily allotted screentime, Atticus builds a pillow fort in the center of the living room. Before he enters the structure, his grandmother hands him a scavenger hunt on a folded piece of paper. She tells young Atticus that he must find all the items on that list before he can return. Atticus accepts the challenge and dives in! Soon after Atticus crawls inside the pillow fort, he realizes that something is very different!"

options.name: Digital Copy of Caffeinated Hearts ☕
options.desc:
Digital copy of Caffeinated Hearts added to your pledge! Written by Jonathan Hedrick with artwork by Stefano Cardoselli and letters by Jerome Gagnon. 
Synopsis: "Follow a beautifully tattooed barista named Amarella across four vignettes that are blended through this slice-of-life comic book set in a coffee shop with a cyberpunk backdrop. These robust tales will warm your heart like a fresh batch of java poured into your favorite morning mug. Step inside and enjoy!" For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Capable #1
options.desc:
Also written by Jonathan Hedrick!
Synopsis: "Derik Davidson is just an average high school kid. He's awkward, shy, bullied, and he uses a wheelchair. But one day Derik suddenly has the ability to run super fast! What will Derik do with his new power and what happens when more people wake up capable?!" For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Capable #2
options.desc:
Also written by Jonathan Hedrick!
Synopsis: "After experiencing a tragic loss, Derik doesn't have much time to dwell before he has to spring into action. The first bad-guy of the series is introduced and this man is fully armed! While Derik is hard at work saving the day, another person in his life learns of their own newly found superpower and it's a big eye opener." For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Capable #3
options.desc:
Also written by Jonathan Hedrick!
Synopsis: "Just as Derik thinks his life might start getting better now that he has superpowers, he's quickly reminded that it can't be that easy. As more people are discovering their new abilities, some are taking it to the extreme! Not everyone is happy with their changes and others have malicious plans." For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Capable #4
options.desc:
Also written by Jonathan Hedrick!
Synopsis: "Derik finally has it all: the girl, the powers, and the popularity. But someone is prepared to crush Derik’s joy by stopping him in his tracks and flipping his world upside down! Before the menace has time to celebrate his deadly act, a new villain enters the stage with a mysterious ability." For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Capable #5
options.desc:
Also written by Jonathan Hedrick!
Synopsis: "Angry and alone following another loss of a loved one, Derik finds himself reaching a breaking point. When it feels like it can’t get any worse, he comes face-to-face with a seemingly impossible enemy. Then the latest threat shows Derik just how deadly he can be." For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Capable #6
options.desc:
Also written by Jonathan Hedrick!
Synopsis: "A silence falls across the globe. Derik has lost his abilities. A vicious and all-powerful entity holds the world at its mercy. With hope seemingly lost, Derik pays a visit to a familiar face who gives him the spark he needs to save everyone." For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Capable #7
options.desc:
Also written by Jonathan Hedrick!
Synopsis: "Derik has been racing nonstop ever since he gained his superpower. Now he seems to be running out of road. In the end, he will have to make the most difficult decision of his life in order to save everyone else. But will his sacrifice be enough to rescue the entire world?" For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Freakshow Knight 🧟
options.desc:
Add on a digital copy of Freakshow Knight to your rewards! Written by Jonathan Hedrick with artwork by Stefano Cardoselli, letters by Cristian Docolomansky and edited by Chuck Pineau. For mature readers.
Synopsis: "During his time in prison, Red was surrounded by the worst types of people: thieves, rapists, and murderers. Now on the outside, he's surrounded by the living dead. Armed with the only thing he's ever known - violence - Red finds one last chance at redemption for a lifetime of sin."

options.name: Digital Copy of Freakshow Princess 🧟‍♀️
options.desc: Digital copy of Freakshow Princess added to your pledge! Written by Jonathan Hedrick with pencils & inks by Ben Worrell, colors by Sunil Ghagre and letters by CJ Jeffrey. Synopsis: "Jessica and her dog, Harley, are trapped inside of her boarded up house with a terrible threat growing outside. As the danger slowly increases, she thinks back to what got her in this situation and perhaps the threat is already inside her home!" For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Hyper/Aware 🚀
options.desc: Add a digital copy of the award winning comic book Hyper/Aware to your rewards! Written by Jonathan Hedrick with pencils, inks, colors, and letters by Debora Lancianese. Synopsis: "After three astronauts are stranded in deep space, they learn that only two of them will be able to enter hypersleep for the long return home. One of the crew members makes the difficult decision to remain awake and live the rest of his life alone with only the spacecraft's onboard A.I. for company. But when the other two astronauts wake up, they discover something horrible has happened while they were unconscious!" For mature readers.

Synopsis: "Terry a farm fresh space academy grad who longs for nothing more than to get back to the love of his life. After he is teleported to a strange alien world for insubordination, he quickly realizes the punishment does not fit the crime. This is a one-shot NSFW alien-zombie space comedy for fans of Zombieland and The Orville!" For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Quicksand #1 ⏳
options.desc:
Add on a digital copy of Quicksand #1 (not the Scout edition) to your pledge!
Written by Jonathan Hedrick, pencils & inks by Debora Lancianese, colors by Sunil Ghagre, and letters by Cristian Docolomansky.
Synopsis: After a mysterious hole opens in the Egyptian desert, horrific creatures climb out and wreak havoc on a nearby city. They retreat as quickly as they arrived, leaving the planet in shock by this unfathomable event. A team of elite specialists from around the globe called "Canary One" are sent after the monsters to discover more about them. But when the crew never returns, the world must prepare for the possibility of another wave of attacks.
For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Quicksand #2 ⏳
options.desc:
Add on a digital copy of Quicksand #2 (not the Scout edition) to your pledge!
Written by Jonathan Hedrick, pencils & inks by Debora Lancianese, colors by Sunil Ghagre, and letters by Cristian Docolomansky.
Synopsis: A little over a year has passed since monsters crawled out of the sands near the Egyptian pyramids. Now the nearby military base echoes with sound of alarms as the creatures return to the surface once again. Stephanie Noon, wife of lost Canary One crew leader, is on the ground and ready to take action. But this time the monsters have brought something unexpected with them. For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Quicksand #3 ⏳
options.desc:
Add on a digital copy of Quicksand #3 (not the Scout edition) to your pledge!
Written by Jonathan Hedrick, pencils & inks by Debora Lancianese, colors by Sunil Ghagre, and letters by Cristian Docolomansky.
Synopsis: Immediately following the second wave of attacks from the underground monsters, Stephanie receives an order to begin preparing for another mission below the surface of the Earth. Before she starts assembling her team, she questions one of the original crew members of Canary One who was returned by the creatures. What he recounts of his time in the subterranean land is nothing short of warning to never go back down there!
For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of The Space Cadet 🌙
options.desc:
Add on a digital copy of this 20-paged all-ages story to your rewards!
Written by Jonathan Hedrick, artwork by Stefano Cardoselli, and letters by Joel Rodriguez.
Synopsis: "A child with big dreams of going to the Moon someday. One magical night, the youngster wakes up on the lunar surface! A friendly astronaut gives a tour of Earth's solitary satellite and teaches the importance of working hard to achieve your dreams."

options.name: Digital Copy of Hospice: The Scaled Key
options.desc:
Did you miss the 1st campaign of Hospice: Season 2? No worries! You can add on a digital copy with your pledge right now. 

Synopsis: "Alistair Redgrave, a generational demon hunter, loses his arm in hell while the only gateway back to Earth tries to close. He now is on the hunt to find demons that have managed to slip through splinters of what's left of the door. Capturing these demons gives him access to control them while regrowing his arm to finally shut the door to hell for good."

Written by Sean Wood, artwork by Rodrigo Catraca, and letters by Letter Squids.

options.name: Digital Copy of Brackish #1 🐊
options.desc:
Digital REMASTERED copy of Brackish #1 added to your pledge! Written by Jonathan Hedrick with artwork by Riccardo Faccini, colors by Ichsan Ansori and letters by Leo McGovern. Includes a lettered preview of Brackish #2!
Synopsis: "Two families have lived for generations on separate sides of a Florida swamp. The Tappers control the freshwater area where they make their moonshine and the Saltzman’s control the saltwater side from which their family fortune has grown from the abundant tourism. A truce was made a century ago to end their constant feud over the brackish part where their lands unite. But when the youngest Tapper son and youngest Saltzman daughter fall in love, the truce is broken and both sides of the swamp will never be the same again." For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Christmas in July #3 🎅
options.desc:
Digital copy of this 26-paged collection of 3 exclusive stories by some of the best creators in indie comics! For mature readers.
Featuring spooky holiday tales by Jonathan Hedrick, Hernán González. Phil Butehorn, Dan Buksa, Jimmy Gaspero, Fish Lee, Damir Rošić and Jerome Gagnon.

options.name: Digital Copy of Spillblood 🔥💀🔥
options.desc:
Add on a digital copy of Spillblood (Kickstarter Edition) to your pledge!
Written by Jonathan Hedrick, artwork by Stefano Cardoselli, and letters by Leo McGovern.
Synopsis: 36 pages of blood-splattered horror from the creative duo of Jonathan Hedrick (Can I Scream?) and Stefano Cardoselli (Don't Spit In The Wind)! Rejected by Heaven and exiled from Hell, a doomed priest walks the borderline between living and dead. He listens to those who cry to their deity for forgiveness. Then at night... he will spill blood!
For mature readers.

Receive a lifetime paid subscription to Jonathan Hedrick's email newsletter on Substack! Get subscriber-only posts, audio editions and access to the full archive. Post comments, start threads in the chat, and join the community. Never miss an update on my latest projects!
No matter if the price goes up for others, you will never be charged again.
This is your investment in me and I would be eternally grateful for you believing in my success!

gone.name: Digital Full-Body Commission

Pledge Over Time is available for this reward!

Includes physical copies of all covers and the digital deluxe reward tier.

options.name: Digital Copy of Atticus #1 in B&W 🖤🤍
options.desc: Add on a fully lettered black and white edition of Atticus & The Magical Pillow Fort #1 written by Jonathan Hedrick!

options.name: Digital Copy of Atticus & TMPF #1 🏰
options.desc:
Digital copy of Atticus & The Magical Pillow Fort #1 (in color) added to your pledge! Written by Jonathan Hedrick with artwork by Debora Lancianese, colors by Ichsan Ansori and letters/logo by Leo McGovern. 
Synopsis: "One rainy day, a little boy named Atticus is stuck inside the house with his grandmother. Nearly bored to tears after maxing out his daily allotted screentime, Atticus builds a pillow fort in the center of the living room. Before he enters the structure, his grandmother hands him a scavenger hunt on a folded piece of paper. She tells young Atticus that he must find all the items on that list before he can return. Atticus accepts the challenge and dives in! Soon after Atticus crawls inside the pillow fort, he realizes that something is very different!"

options.name: Digital Copy of Caffeinated Hearts ☕
options.desc:
Digital copy of Caffeinated Hearts added to your pledge! Written by Jonathan Hedrick with artwork by Stefano Cardoselli and letters by Jerome Gagnon. 
Synopsis: "Follow a beautifully tattooed barista named Amarella across four vignettes that are blended through this slice-of-life comic book set in a coffee shop with a cyberpunk backdrop. These robust tales will warm your heart like a fresh batch of java poured into your favorite morning mug. Step inside and enjoy!" For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Capable #1
options.desc:
Also written by Jonathan Hedrick!
Synopsis: "Derik Davidson is just an average high school kid. He's awkward, shy, bullied, and he uses a wheelchair. But one day Derik suddenly has the ability to run super fast! What will Derik do with his new power and what happens when more people wake up capable?!" For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Capable #2
options.desc:
Also written by Jonathan Hedrick!
Synopsis: "After experiencing a tragic loss, Derik doesn't have much time to dwell before he has to spring into action. The first bad-guy of the series is introduced and this man is fully armed! While Derik is hard at work saving the day, another person in his life learns of their own newly found superpower and it's a big eye opener." For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Capable #3
options.desc:
Also written by Jonathan Hedrick!
Synopsis: "Just as Derik thinks his life might start getting better now that he has superpowers, he's quickly reminded that it can't be that easy. As more people are discovering their new abilities, some are taking it to the extreme! Not everyone is happy with their changes and others have malicious plans." For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Capable #4
options.desc:
Also written by Jonathan Hedrick!
Synopsis: "Derik finally has it all: the girl, the powers, and the popularity. But someone is prepared to crush Derik’s joy by stopping him in his tracks and flipping his world upside down! Before the menace has time to celebrate his deadly act, a new villain enters the stage with a mysterious ability." For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Capable #5
options.desc:
Also written by Jonathan Hedrick!
Synopsis: "Angry and alone following another loss of a loved one, Derik finds himself reaching a breaking point. When it feels like it can’t get any worse, he comes face-to-face with a seemingly impossible enemy. Then the latest threat shows Derik just how deadly he can be." For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Capable #6
options.desc:
Also written by Jonathan Hedrick!
Synopsis: "A silence falls across the globe. Derik has lost his abilities. A vicious and all-powerful entity holds the world at its mercy. With hope seemingly lost, Derik pays a visit to a familiar face who gives him the spark he needs to save everyone." For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Capable #7
options.desc:
Also written by Jonathan Hedrick!
Synopsis: "Derik has been racing nonstop ever since he gained his superpower. Now he seems to be running out of road. In the end, he will have to make the most difficult decision of his life in order to save everyone else. But will his sacrifice be enough to rescue the entire world?" For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Freakshow Knight 🧟
options.desc:
Add on a digital copy of Freakshow Knight to your rewards! Written by Jonathan Hedrick with artwork by Stefano Cardoselli, letters by Cristian Docolomansky and edited by Chuck Pineau. For mature readers.
Synopsis: "During his time in prison, Red was surrounded by the worst types of people: thieves, rapists, and murderers. Now on the outside, he's surrounded by the living dead. Armed with the only thing he's ever known - violence - Red finds one last chance at redemption for a lifetime of sin."

options.name: Digital Copy of Freakshow Princess 🧟‍♀️
options.desc: Digital copy of Freakshow Princess added to your pledge! Written by Jonathan Hedrick with pencils & inks by Ben Worrell, colors by Sunil Ghagre and letters by CJ Jeffrey. Synopsis: "Jessica and her dog, Harley, are trapped inside of her boarded up house with a terrible threat growing outside. As the danger slowly increases, she thinks back to what got her in this situation and perhaps the threat is already inside her home!" For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Hyper/Aware 🚀
options.desc: Add a digital copy of the award winning comic book Hyper/Aware to your rewards! Written by Jonathan Hedrick with pencils, inks, colors, and letters by Debora Lancianese. Synopsis: "After three astronauts are stranded in deep space, they learn that only two of them will be able to enter hypersleep for the long return home. One of the crew members makes the difficult decision to remain awake and live the rest of his life alone with only the spacecraft's onboard A.I. for company. But when the other two astronauts wake up, they discover something horrible has happened while they were unconscious!" For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of KP Presents ArcticA🐻‍❄️
options.desc: Digital copy of Kerra Prime Presents ArcticA added to your pledge! Written by Jonathan Hedrick, art by Rom Silva, colors by Edgar Tavitas, and letters by Jerome Gagnon. Synopsis: "This action packed issue follows ArcticA as she escapes from the company that invested millions of dollars to create her and she finds herself in the wild. ArcticA happens to be roaming the same area of land that is know to be home to the creature known as Loggerhead and when these two meet, things could get out of hand!" For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Quicksand #1 ⏳

Written by Jonathan Hedrick, pencils & inks by Debora Lancianese, colors by Sunil Ghagre, and letters by Cristian Docolomansky.
Synopsis: After a mysterious hole opens in the Egyptian desert, horrific creatures climb out and wreak havoc on a nearby city. They retreat as quickly as they arrived, leaving the planet in shock by this unfathomable event. A team of elite specialists from around the globe called "Canary One" are sent after the monsters to discover more about them. But when the crew never returns, the world must prepare for the possibility of another wave of attacks.
For mature readers.

options.desc:
Digital copy of Atticus & The Magical Pillow Fort #1 (in color) added to your pledge! Written by Jonathan Hedrick with artwork by Debora Lancianese, colors by Ichsan Ansori and letters/logo by Leo McGovern. 
Synopsis: "One rainy day, a little boy named Atticus is stuck inside the house with his grandmother. Nearly bored to tears after maxing out his daily allotted screentime, Atticus builds a pillow fort in the center of the living room. Before he enters the structure, his grandmother hands him a scavenger hunt on a folded piece of paper. She tells young Atticus that he must find all the items on that list before he can return. Atticus accepts the challenge and dives in! Soon after Atticus crawls inside the pillow fort, he realizes that something is very different!"

options.name: Digital Copy of Caffeinated Hearts ☕
options.desc:
Digital copy of Caffeinated Hearts added to your pledge! Written by Jonathan Hedrick with artwork by Stefano Cardoselli and letters by Jerome Gagnon. 
Synopsis: "Follow a beautifully tattooed barista named Amarella across four vignettes that are blended through this slice-of-life comic book set in a coffee shop with a cyberpunk backdrop. These robust tales will warm your heart like a fresh batch of java poured into your favorite morning mug. Step inside and enjoy!" For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Capable #1
options.desc:
Also written by Jonathan Hedrick!
Synopsis: "Derik Davidson is just an average high school kid. He's awkward, shy, bullied, and he uses a wheelchair. But one day Derik suddenly has the ability to run super fast! What will Derik do with his new power and what happens when more people wake up capable?!" For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Capable #2
options.desc:
Also written by Jonathan Hedrick!
Synopsis: "After experiencing a tragic loss, Derik doesn't have much time to dwell before he has to spring into action. The first bad-guy of the series is introduced and this man is fully armed! While Derik is hard at work saving the day, another person in his life learns of their own newly found superpower and it's a big eye opener." For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Capable #3
options.desc:
Also written by Jonathan Hedrick!
Synopsis: "Just as Derik thinks his life might start getting better now that he has superpowers, he's quickly reminded that it can't be that easy. As more people are discovering their new abilities, some are taking it to the extreme! Not everyone is happy with their changes and others have malicious plans." For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Capable #4
options.desc:

Synopsis: "Derik finally has it all: the girl, the powers, and the popularity. But someone is prepared to crush Derik’s joy by stopping him in his tracks and flipping his world upside down! Before the menace has time to celebrate his deadly act, a new villain enters the stage with a mysterious ability." For mature readers.

options.name: Digital Copy of Capable #5
options.desc:

options.name: Digital Copy of Capable #6

options.name: Digital Copy of Capable #7
options.desc:
