project.name: Titaner Tisolver: 3-in-1 Titanium Calculating Ring Ruler
project.description: Gr5 Titanium| Metric⇄Imperial | Area Calc | HUD Red Line| Addictive Fidget Click| All-Terrain O-Ring Grip | EDC Math Pendant | Fine CNC

creator.name: Titaner-ZR
creator.biography:
Founded in 2005, Titaner is a team of outdoor enthusiasts, industrial designers, and craftsmen dedicated to designing and manufacturing high-end EDC gear.
As a pioneer in the EDC field, we continuously redefine industry standards with exceptional titanium products and lead cross-scene innovation in multifunctional design.
We pursue perfection in every detail, utilizing high-precision CNC machining to create titanium gear that is both durable and aesthetically refined.
With relentless innovation and continuous breakthroughs, Titaner is committed to delivering even greater products. Stay tuned—our best creations are yet to come!

node.name: BackerLead: Keep up with leading idea

titre: Share the Love, Earn cash back!
1.The Totem of Logic: Versatile Carry System
The Evolution: Titaner Ring Ruler Family Comparison
So... How Much Does It Cost?
texte: Hi! We are Titaner.
Over the past five years, we've proudly delivered our passion projects to over 43,545+ backers around the world. Now, we're excited to unveil our 66th Kickstarter campaign:
Reviving the lost art of analog calculation.
Before silicon chips ruled the world, before glowing screens took over our thinking, engineers relied on slide rules to build skyscrapers—and even to send humans to the Moon.
Computation in that era was about finding answers through direct interaction with the physical world. It carried a particular clarity—an unmistakable kind of romance belonging to the mechanical age.
At Titaner, we have long been fascinated by this kind of intelligence at the fingertips.
Years ago, we created the world’s first titanium ring ruler, completely redefining what a “ruler” could be. That original point in titanium became the starting point of a long evolution.
After three generations of iteration, our pursuit of precision has diverged into two clearly different paths:
Today, we are proud to introduce the latest piece in this line of calculation — Tisolver.

It is a bridge between the physical world and the mathematical world. It takes the accumulated wisdom of the slide rule and houses it in an aerospace-grade titanium body, bringing analog calculation back to your fingertips.
We are not simply selling a ruler; we are delivering a portable geometric solution.
We are not just making tools—we are listening to your voices.
On our previous calculating ruler, we chose a fine ratcheting feel. It was smooth, but many of you told us: “I want clearer feedback.”
So with Tisolver, we responded by bringing back the widely praised soul of the first-generation Tiroler—the high-strength magnetic lock.

Every time Tisolver completes a full rotation (10 cm), the magnetic system releases a clear, firm tactile pulse, accompanied by a crisp “click.”
That click is a private signal between you and the numbers. You don’t need to stare at the scale constantly—your fingers and your ears tell you how far it has traveled. This is intuition in its most practical, craftsman-like form.

Simple and intuitive, with no mental math required:
(Number of clicks × 10) + current reading = total length
Here’s a simple example:

👂 Hear 2 clicks / tactile pulses (20 cm)
👀 Align the window with 3 (3 cm)
✅ Result = 23 cm
With this built-in navigation system, you are finally freed from the limitations of a straight ruler.
Effortlessly measure all kinds of irregular curves in daily life—this is the unique appeal of the ring ruler.
Standard CNC knurling is cool—but on certain extreme surfaces, it still isn’t enough.
So for Tisolver, we upgraded the contact surface with a custom soft rubber O-ring, delivering a higher level of physical friction.
But for Titaner, that still wasn’t enough.

This is an invisible design—something you won’t see, but you will feel in use. On the inner side of Tisolver’s metal rim, we precisely machined a ring of special reverse anti-slip teeth. These metal teeth firmly bite into the inside of the soft rubber O-ring.
The result?
Whether on a greasy workshop table or freshly splashed wet glass, Tisolver stays planted and rolls with control—like a gecko gripping a surface.
Blurry readings? No. We gave Tisolver a pair of tactical glasses.

In pursuit of the best possible reading experience, bare metal markings were not enough for us. We designed a precise quarter-arc transparent reading window. It’s not just a cover—it functions more like an optical component.

At first glance, you’ll notice a vivid red reference line embedded at the center of the window. It works much like a sniper scope, locking onto the scale and making the numbers easier to read at a glance.

We use PMMA (recyclable acrylic), precision-machined on top-tier CNC equipment.
It offers over 92% light transmission—higher than standard glass—while delivering 10–15× the impact resistance of glass.
PMMA is BPA-free, non-toxic, and when burned, it primarily produces carbon dioxide and water. It also has excellent resistance to aging and UV exposure, remaining clear and stable for over ten years.
This is the most suitable material we could find for the job.

The Titaner-level detail lies in how this window is executed. It perfectly follows the curvature of the ring ruler and intentionally includes a slight raised clearance. This space prevents the transparent window from rubbing against the finely etched markings inside, while also providing a degree of physical protection for those markings. At the same time, it introduces a subtle parallax effect that helps achieve clearer, more accurate readings.

Tisolver is not just for recording data—it’s for solving problems.
By etching two of the most commonly used engineering logics onto the titanium Side A and Side B, Tisolver transforms from a simple ruler into an analog computer.

Want to know what the data in your hand looks like in another language?
In a world where metric and imperial systems coexist, conversion is always a headache
(1 inch = 2.54 cm? Forget it—no one wants to do mental math while working).
Tisolver makes this intuitive. On Side A, we laser-etched both a 10 cm metric scale and a 4-inch imperial scale on the same ring. It becomes a physical bridge between two measurement languages.
First, use the built-in magnetic tactile feedback to return Tisolver to zero, and align the transparent HUD window with the zero mark. This is the starting point for all calculations.

For values under 10 cm (for example, 7 cm), simply rotate the transparent window and align the red reference line with the metric number 7.
The imperial scale that the pointer crosses at that moment is your answer.
If you measured the length with Tisolver first and then convert units, you’ll notice that the red line naturally aligns with both metric and imperial values at the same time—simple and intuitive.
For larger numbers—say, the “ultimate answer to the universe,” 42—this is where classic slide-rule logic comes in: the decimal shift.

No need to open an app. Just glance down—the answer is already there.
Measurement, calculation, and communication have never flowed this smoothly.

A traditional ruler can only tell you how long a line is.
Tisolver can tell you how large a surface is.

For designers, leather crafters, and DIY enthusiasts, this is more than a ruler—it’s a secret weapon in your pocket. As you measure a side length, the corresponding squared value (area) appears directly.
Cutting a square piece of vegetable-tanned leather? Estimating the coverage area of a wooden board?
Measure just one side, and you can immediately anticipate the area. This isn’t simple arithmetic—it’s the magic of unfolding a one-dimensional world into two dimensions.
On Side B, we built an entirely new logic:

The outer ring retains the standard 10 cm metric scale.
The inner ring is etched with a dedicated square-calculation scale.
The operation is as natural as breathing.
Just like Side A, use the magnetic tactile feedback to return Tisolver to zero, and align the transparent HUD window with the zero mark.

Simply rotate the transparent window and align the red reference line with the side length on the outer scale (for example, 5 cm).
Before you even have time to think, the red line is already pointing to the calculated result on the inner scale (25).

If you measured the length with Tisolver and then perform the calculation, you’ll notice that the red line aligns with both the metric value and the squared value at the same time. The interesting part is that when you flip Tisolver over, the red line also aligns with the corresponding imperial value. In other words, with a single measurement, you get the imperial equivalent and the squared result at once.
This is the appeal of analog calculation—no buttons, no waiting, just a direct physical connection between input and output.
With a single measurement, you can obtain both the imperial equivalent and the squared value. What’s the secret behind this?
In this design, we carefully arranged the scale logic. Side A and Side B roll in opposite directions, giving Tisolver true all-around adaptability.

It’s not just that one roll reveals all the related values. More importantly, no matter whether you naturally pull from left to right or push from right to left—whether you’re left-handed or right-handed—the dual-side scale logic of Tisolver adapts naturally to your intuition.
You don’t need to decide in advance whether you’re “calculating area” or “checking imperial units.” Just focus on the measurement itself.

Once the roll is complete, the distance is structurally locked. At that moment:
Want metric-to-imperial conversion? Look at Side A.
Want area estimation? Look at Side B.
Or maybe you simply have a number in mind and want to know its square or its imperial equivalent.
All the data in Tisolver exists simultaneously. This non-linear workflow lets you move through complex tasks with ease.

Tisolver shouldn’t be buried in the dark corner of a toolbox.
It’s a badge—representing your appreciation for precision manufacturing and logical thinking.

We designed Tisolver so you can carry it with you 24 hours a day.
It’s both a tool—and a seriously functional everyday carry item.

Every Tisolver comes with a lanyard. You can wear it on your chest, where it becomes an engineer’s talisman, always ready for the next measurement challenge. Or you can attach it to your tactical backpack, zipper pull, or keychain. Its matte titanium-gray finish subtly elevates the look of your entire EDC setup.

Looking for even more protection? You can add our custom vegetable-tanned leather sheath. Over time, the leather will darken and develop a natural patina, recording the marks of use and time—forming a quiet contrast between soft leather and titanium that never wears out.
When you’re stuck thinking through a solution, or waiting for a render to finish exporting, your hands need something to release the tension. Tisolver becomes that switch for your thinking.
Thanks to its addictive magnetic mechanism, Tisolver doubles as a high-quality fidget toy.
This crisp, rhythmic mechanical feedback helps ease anxiety and guide the mind into a flow state. It doesn’t distract you—it helps you focus.

For us, “designed for lifelong use” is not just a promise engraved in metal—it’s a philosophy of growing and evolving together with you. And this Kickstarter campaign is where that philosophy truly comes to life.

Our designers are not working alone in a closed workshop. They stand here alongside you—our most trusted partners and co-creators—listening carefully to every idea and suggestion. Because we firmly believe that a truly great product is never created in isolation; it is shaped by the real experience and insight of the people who rely on it every day.
The journey of Titaner Tisolver does not begin on an assembly line. It begins with a solid block of GR5 titanium.
Like Michelangelo facing a block of marble, we use top-tier CNC machines to carve each component over many hours of precise machining. Every edge is finished with smooth, rounded CNC chamfers.

To be honest, this is time-consuming, labor-intensive work—something few are willing to do. But we believe true quality doesn’t need to be explained in a manual. The moment you hold it in your hand, you’ll understand.

That warm, smooth feel, as if it naturally belongs in your palm; the flawless detailing that never catches your skin, no matter the angle—
all of it tells you one thing: our obsession is worth it.
Sweat, rain, seawater—for inferior metals, these are nightmares.
They can turn so-called “tough” tools into rusted, fragile objects overnight. But our hero—GR5 titanium—is completely immune.

It is non-toxic, skin-friendly, and corrosion-resistant—a “super material” safe enough to be implanted in the human body. No matter how harsh the environment, it remains clean and stable, protecting you through every adventure.
We chose an extremely fine blasted matte finish. It removes the cold, harsh feel of raw metal and gives the body a smooth, pebble-like warmth and a refined grip.
This matte surface creates ideal diffuse reflection, reducing glare under strong light and making the engraved scales easier to read.
In addition to the metric version, Tisolver is also available in an imperial option.

We previously designed our imperial ring ruler with a 5-inch circumference. However, we recognized that the imperial system is fundamentally base-12, and 5 inches proved cumbersome for real-world calculations.
That's why we re-engineered the TiSolver with a 6-inch imperial circumference.
2 Rolls = 1 Foot.
This base-12 optimized adjustment transforms traditionally awkward imperial math into an experience that is unprecedentedly smooth and intuitive.

The unboxing moment should be part of the experience as well.
Your Titaner Tisolver arrives in a beautifully designed gift box. Whether you’re rewarding yourself after a hard year, or giving it to a friend or family member who shares your love for life, it’s a gift that’s sure to earn a genuine “Wow.”

One more thing worth mentioning: this elegant box is made from 100% recycled paper.
Yes—while pursuing performance and precision, we’re also making a small effort for the planet.

We are not newcomers to Kickstarter. Over the past five years, we have successfully delivered our work to more than 43,535 backers. We’ve faced every challenge you can imagine (yes, including those epic supply-chain issues) and have maintained a 100% fulfillment rate throughout.

We understand that in the world of crowdfunding, keeping your word matters far more than polished language.
But don’t just take it from us—listen to what longtime members of the Titaner community have to say.
You can make your Titaner TiSolver even more versatile!
When supporting this project on Kickstarter, you won't be billed for shipping immediately. Instead, shipping fee will be charged via a fulfillment survey after the campaign ends.

Please Note: The listed price is for the product only and does not include shipping or Sales tax / VAT. After the campaign ends, shipping costs will be calculated based on your region. Customs/import taxes vary by country and are the supporter's responsibility to check and pay.

We’re a small team of engineers and friends who share a deep love for design and precision craftsmanship.
The Titaner Tisolver isn’t just our newest creation — it’s our redefinition of what a “good tool” can be.

For us, a great tool isn’t just about performance — it’s about feel, detail, and the invisible connection between maker and user.And if you haven’t heard of our “Dreams Come True” program — you should.If you’ve got a bold idea for a new product, we’d love to help you make it real — and reward you generously for it.

Hey — you made it all the way here! 🎉
You’re awesome.
We want to sincerely thank every friend who’s supported Titaner — whether you’ve been with us since our first project or you’re just discovering us today.

Your trust, feedback, and enthusiasm have made this journey meaningful beyond words.
Building a brand with people who share our passion is the coolest thing we can imagine.
It’s our greatest honor to keep creating things we truly love — and to share them proudly with the world.

Thank you again.
May your gear inspire your next great story. 👋
We'd like to hear from you. If you want a quicker response, feel free to email us at freya@titaner.com

project.name: T8- The Adjustable Titanium Safety Razor for Every Face
project.description: Titanium. CNC Machining. Adjustable. Eight Settings. One Razor for Every Face.

creator.name: TROWELL
creator.biography:
TROWELL is a design-driven brand based in Hong Kong, a city shaped by cultures, languages, and people from around the world. This diversity influences how we think about everyday tools: they should be universal, adaptable, and respectful of different habits, skin types, and needs.

We focus on thoughtful engineering, durable materials, and restrained design — creating products that work naturally across borders and routines. T8, our first project, reflects this philosophy through precise adjustability, professional engineering, and a commitment to long-term use. Our goal is simple: to build tools that people around the world can trust, use daily, and enjoy for years to come.

node.name: BackerLead: Keep up with leading idea

titre: Still compromising on the shaving experience?
Not Any Safety Razor You Can Get Everywhere.
💎Beauty= Productivity, Form & Function All at Once
texte: T8 is a modern evolution of the classic double-edge safety razor — redesigned with precision engineering, premium materials, and true adjustability at its core.
It delivers a close, comfortable shave without irritation, gimmicks, or waste — and it’s intuitive enough for anyone to use, even if you’ve only ever shaved with cartridges or electric shavers.

T8 is the safety razor we set out to create, shaped by our design experience, engineering expertise, aesthetic sensibilities, and understanding of what makes a great shaving tool. It is the result of extensive prototyping, testing, and refinement.
After more than four months of focused research and hands-on evaluation, we arrived at a version the entire team genuinely loves and uses.

What impressed us most came next. After analyzing key geometric parameters across a wide range of mainstream double-edge safety razors, we found that T8’s benchmarks naturally span the same effective range as many of the most popular and well-regarded designs.
T8 stays within the proven limits of these razors while offering continuous adjustability, ensuring consistent performance and a high-quality shaving experience at every setting.

For those who prefer a more conservative shaving experience, we’re exploring the possibility of expanding the adjustment range, for example from −0.10 mm to +0.30 mm. If this can’t be achieved while maintaining the same form factor and overall dimensions, we’ll offer multiple configuration options—such as −0.17 mm to +0.17 mm, 0 mm to +0.25 mm, or the current +0.17 mm to +0.32 mm range.
We’ll share our final decision in a future update and we love feedback from backers on your preferred settings.

We apply the same rigorous research and development processes to every stage of our razors — from design and analysis to validation and production. Our goal is simple: to deliver shaving tools that meet the standards of laboratory-level research and testing. We take the pursuit of the ultimate shaving experience seriously, and we design every razor with that commitment in mind. This is shaving reduced to what actually matters:
Control, Balance, and Precision.
From setting 1 to 8, the adjustment is linear and continuous — allowing countless personalized configurations between the two extremes.
At the heart of T8 is a fully adjustable mechanism that allows you to fine-tune the shave to your exact needs. Settings 1 through 8 change in a linear, continuous manner.
With eight distinct settings, T8 adapts to:
As you turn the dial from 1 to 8, the blade gap and blade angle adjust together — optimizing efficiency while maintaining comfort.
One razor. Total control.

The settings shown in the usage scenarios above are for reference only. Shaving preferences vary from person to person, and users are free to choose the settings that feel most comfortable for them — whether mild or more aggressive.
Despite its precision, T8 couldn’t be simpler.

Modern cartridge systems rely on multiple blades and lubrication strips, electronic razors uses pivoting heads and plastic — yet still manage to cause irritation and drive costs higher year after year.
T8 uses standard double-edge razor blades for a reason:
You don’t need subscriptions, marketing gimmicks, or six blades on your face to get a great shave.

There is no standard answer for what shaving angle (the angle between the blade and your skin) works the best. But we all know that the shaving angles for different face, facial hair types and stubble lengths are different. So it's very important that the shaving angles can be adapted to the different faces, or a certain condition of the same face. The 1~8 sizes of T8 makes it super easy to adjust the angle by adjusting the rotating knob at the bottom.

You don't need the protractor to find your perfect angle. You just twist your T8 starting from size 1, and feel how it works at different size, and remember the best setting for you. You can even have size 1 or 2 for "1 day shaving interval" , and size 4 or 5 "3 day shaving interval" . If you are with thicker and coarser facial hair, you can start from 3 and choose the best that works for you. Your T8, your say.
T8 gives you the perfect freedom to choose the best settings for you. And the scale lines make it super easy to find the perfect angle every time.
Have you ever wondered, like we have?

This isn’t a necessity, but many discerning men choose to use two or even three razors to achieve their ideal shave. With T8, a single razor can do the work of many. Its continuous adjustability invites exploration and fine-tuning, turning shaving into a process of discovery rather than repetition.

We believe there’s a quiet kind of happiness in this—finding satisfaction in the things that must be done. Within everyday routines, T8 creates space to slow down, care for yourself, and enjoy moments of calm. It’s an opportunity to step out of the noise, enter a state of flow, and find simple fulfillment in a familiar ritual.
There are so many reasons you’ll love the T8. And these details are why you’ll leave this T8 on your washbasin and start to look forward to the daily shaving routine.

You can choose to use the open comb or close comb on the either sides of the top cap. Closed comb feature a safety bar providing a milder shaving making it well-suited for beginners or those with sensitive skin or daily shaving. Open comb razors have a design that allows hair to be guided to the blade, offering a closer shave. They are preferred by experienced users especially those with longer or coarser hair as they also allow shaved hair and lather to escape more easily.

After the project end, backers will be able to select their preferred comb configuration in the post-campaign survey (where shipping address, razor configurations and add-ons will be confirmed by backers) . Options will include dual closed comb, dual open comb, or a mixed open-and-closed comb, as shown in the current prototype.

T8 features a clog-free design, whether you choose the close comb or open comb, there is guiding grooves for the hair and shaving cream to leave the blade, so it won't clog no matter if you are with thin and soft hair or thick and coarser hair.

By saying full titanium, we meant even the spring inside is made from titanium. So everything on T8 can withstand the test of heat, cold, drop, and disinfectant of all types. It's a bullet-proof razor, and the only thing that needs to be replaced is the double-edged razor that can be found almost everywhere in the world at about $0.1 per piece. You can choose your preferred blade based on your habit.

Titanium itself is non-magnetic, so the magnetic function is provided by N52 ring magnets, which are made from an alloy of neodymium, iron, and boron and are fully protected with an anti-corrosion coating. As a result, the only components that are not titanium are the carbon steel blade and the N52 magnets.

Magnetic blade holder on the top of the case is also a detail that will make you "aha~" for that. The blades are securely held at the top the case, and the small slope is super satisfying to put in and take out the double-edged blade.

Besides that, the bottom of the razor is also inbedded with a magnet to guide the bottom to sit firmly at the bottom of the razor case. It's a clever "First locate, then place" design that make the pleasant experience last from the beginning to the end of every shave.
The aluminum case is a magnetic closed one, and at the center of it is a N52 strong magnet that can be used as a great razor stand for T8.

Metallic titanium luster with hand-polish for smooth and glossy feel or beadblast matte gray for calm and low-key style. Forget about the brass with chrome plating or cheap zinc alloy. We are 100% titanium from inside out.

Plus, we take advantage of the titanium metal property and offer a unique purple titanium insert to get rid of the stereotype that all safety razors are just similar. Not for T8. More colors? Let us know in the comment section!

Hollow design can lower the overall weight, provide an anti-slip grip, and to bring the overall aesthetics to the next level. If it’s a whole block of anodized purple part, it’s plain, but the purple inside the hollow handle is like the lace peeking out from the neckline. Of course, if you don’t like this revolutionary mix-color scheme and prefer full gray, full silver or maybe full black, that would be no problem at all, of course.
Not only looks cool and mechanical vibe, but also provide different fit from the right to the left, offering a natural and flowing shaving experience.

The setting scales are processed with nanosecond laser engraving. The marking produces permanent, high-contrast markings that resist wear and fading, without affecting the integrity of the titanium material.
The CNC-machined, properly chamfered adjustment knob is visually refined, easy to operate, non-slip, and designed to minimize dirt and grime buildup.
The aluminum case works as a storage case for shaving on the go or for business trip. The grooved top and matte black finish looks decent and blends in perfectly for any style.
More than a storage case, it also works as a razor stand that’s with a compact profile.
The drain holes on the bottom and the ventilation holes on the front part make sure the inside is always dry and ventilated to prevent bacterial growth.
Ventilation holes on the sides and bottom work together to promote airflow, keeping the interior dry and well-ventilated while helping prevent odors and bacterial buildup.
The silicone strips inside the case also prevent the razor handle from friction or metallic clanging sound during everyday carry. Taking out or putting back the razor is a enjoyment every time.
Even the cheapest cartridge razors cost significantly more over time than T8.
Once you make the switch:
T8 isn’t just a better shave — it’s a smarter one.
T8 is machined entirely from Grade 5 Titanium using high-precision CNC processes.
This isn’t a disposable grooming product. It’s a tool — designed to age with you.

CNC machining allows us to control geometry, tolerances, and surface quality with a level of precision that casting or molding can’t match. For an adjustable safety razor like T8, this precision is critical — it ensures consistent blade alignment, smooth adjustment, and reliable performance at every setting. The result is a tool that feels precise in use, operates smoothly, and maintains its performance over years of daily shaving.
T8 isn’t a marketing name. It’s a designation.
T stands for:
8 represents the eight precision settings that adapt to different skin types, beard densities, and shaving needs.
Simple. Functional. Honest. That’s T8, and that’s our promise to every backer.
We spent 4 months designing and refining T8. Through countless iterations:
We finally got the satisfying razor that's like a piece of art and a precise work of engineering.
Only after achieving a fully functional, production-ready prototype did we move forward. Every detail exists for a reason. Nothing is decorative. Nothing is wasted.
Safety razors have been around for over a century, yet many misconceptions still prevent people from trying them. We want to address a few of the most common ones — honestly and clearly.

In reality, modern cartridge razors often cause more irritation due to multiple blades repeatedly scraping the skin. A well-designed safety razor uses a single blade and controlled geometry, reducing tugging and razor burn. With adjustable settings like those on T8, users can start gently and shave with confidence.

While cartridge razors may seem cheaper upfront, their long-term cost is far higher. Replacement cartridges are expensive and recurring. A titanium safety razor is a one-time investment, and standard double-edge blades cost only pennies. Over time, it’s significantly more economical.

Below is the results based on median market prices across different types of razors. For electric shavers, the calculation accounts for battery lifespan and a reasonable replacement frequency for blade heads. For all other products, blade replacement is calculated using typical replacement intervals under normal usage conditions.

A proper safety razor shave doesn’t need to be slow or complicated. Once familiar, most users find it just as fast as cartridge shaving — often faster, since fewer passes are needed. T8 is designed to make the transition simple, even for busy routines. You can search on Youtube and find any cyber father/ brother pleasing to the eye, and it's way more easier than you thought.
Not true. With an adjustable razor, beginners can start on mild settings and gradually find what works best. There’s no advanced technique required — just a better tool designed to adapt to you.

The concept is classic, but the engineering is modern. T8 combines proven shaving fundamentals with contemporary materials, precision machining, and adjustability — offering a better solution, not a nostalgic one. Classic is the new trend, and T8 can stand the test of the most discerning users and the test of time.

A safety razor offers a simpler, more controlled way to shave. With a single blade and precise angle control, it reduces unnecessary passes over the skin, helping minimize irritation and razor burn. It’s also more cost-effective over time, using affordable, widely available blades instead of expensive cartridges.
Combined with durable materials and thoughtful design, T8 turns shaving into a comfortable, efficient routine—one that’s better for your skin, your wallet, and the long run.
T8 isn’t about nostalgia. And it’s not about trends. It’s about building the best possible shaving tool — one that adapts to every face, eliminates waste, and lasts a lifetime.
Please help us to bring T8 razor to life, and take control of your shave by backing us.

Shipping fees vary by country. Please refer to the shipping cost table on the campaign page for the most accurate and up-to-date information. Backers are responsible for any applicable VAT or local taxes related to their pledge. If you have questions or need additional details, feel free to reach out to us—we’re always happy to help.
TROWELL was founded in Hong Kong — a city shaped by movement, trade, and people from all over the world.

Hong Kong is a true cultural crossroads. Different languages, backgrounds, skin tones, hair types, and daily habits coexist in one place. Growing up and working here means constantly designing for difference — not for a single ideal user, but for everyone.
That perspective defines how we approach product design.
We believe the best tools are universal. They adapt to different hands, different routines, and different needs — without forcing the user to adapt to them.

T8 is our first product, and it reflects that philosophy completely. It is the result of meticulous design, professional engineering, and extensive testing — created to work across a wide range of skin types, facial hair densities, and shaving habits. Adjustable, precise, and built without assumptions, T8 is designed to meet the user where they are.

We chose to launch T8 on a global platform because we believe good design should travel. By sharing our work with a worldwide audience, we hope to reach people who value thoughtful engineering, lasting materials, and a better everyday experience.
Our goal is simple: to create tools that people around the world can use, trust, and enjoy — every time they shave, for as long as they need.
We take fulfillment seriously. And we build products to stand behind.

comments.text: Love the design and idea of this razor. As a NON wet shaver I have used clippers at about 0.5 mm or as low as I can get them without causing irritation for year. Hate having to charge them and annoying when they go flat mid shave. So my question as I have zero experience of wet shaving and grades but will this razor shave at 0.3 leaving a bit of stubble behind without ripping my face up?? Or am I being optimistic here?

replies.text: Most safety razors will get you basically down to the skins surface w/ good technique so yh probably?

comments.text: would prefer able to completely disassemble the razor for cleaning and maintenance by user

How hard would it be to make the comb plates changeable by the users? If you’re going to go the effort of making more than one arrangement, it might be nice (as well as a way to generate more income from addons) to be able to switch those?

I would consider making the handle a little longer. Comparing measurements with the Tatara Muramasa, which is a "small" razor, the Muramasa has a total length of 88.3mm while the handle is 89mm. This razor has a length of 90mm and a handle of 76mm, which makes it really small. It would be preferable for it to be a little longer, even at the expense of weight. Some people have large hands, and this razor barely has any gripping space.

replies.text: This machine gives me the feeling that it's too small.
The Rex Ambassador and Gillette Fatboy - both proven adjustable razors - have handles in the 76mm range, so I don't think the T8 is too short.
Hello Iv3nt,

comments.text: I am a seasoned wet shaving enthusiast with years of facial and head shaving experience. I owned over 100 top of the line DE razors from many well known makers (ATT, Blackland, Tatara, Timeless, Wolfman, Alyworth,...) I can assure you that any blade exposure of more than 2.0 is crazy aggressive and uncomfortable to use.

It seems quite high even at the lowest setting.

project.name: Second-Life Espresso Coffee Scrub
project.description: Repurposed Exfoliating Coffee Scrub | Upcycled & Handcrafted in the USA Wake up your skin and wake up to a better way of beauty.

creator.name: Hannah Zimmerman Bracken
creator.biography: Hi, I’m Hannah, the founder of Milk and Honey Road. My journey into conscious commerce began at the Aveda Institute, where I earned my cosmetology license and developed a deep obsession with ingredient purity. After graduating with a B.S. in Business Management in 2021, I set out to merge my technical skincare expertise with my passion for environmental sustainability.

titre: Introducing: The Second Life Espresso Scrubbing Soap
texte: Our Story: Beauty with a Purpose
I’m Hannah Z., the founder of Milk and Honey Road. My journey began with a simple but powerful mission: to expand sustainable communities through conscious commerce.

With a background as a licensed cosmetologist from the Aveda Institute and a B.S. in Business Management (2021), I founded this company to bridge the gap between high-end skincare and true environmental stewardship. I am naturally obsessed with purity and believe everyone deserves access to clean beauty products free from the toxic fillers and hormone-disrupting synthetic fragrances found in so many over-the-counter brands.

Our flagship product is the culmination of my entire career—a practical solution for radiant skin that also protects our planet. This proprietary formula is crafted using food-grade, premium natural ingredients designed with the skin's "cell-turnover" process as a guiding star.

The Secret Ingredient: Repurposed Espresso We source used espresso beans from local coffee shops to act as a powerful, natural exfoliant. This does more than just scrub away dull skin; it addresses a major environmental hazard:
Waste Diversion: By repurposing coffee grounds, we divert organic biomass from landfills.
Methane Reduction: Preventing organic waste from landfilling stops the generation of methane, a potent greenhouse gas.
Carbon Footprint: This eco-friendly model significantly shrinks our carbon footprint through ethical, transparent sourcing.
Through rigorous trials across creative, scientific, and even medical contexts, we’ve perfected a universal formula that unlocks beauty from within.
Authentic Scent: Our products are never heavily perfumed. Instead, the formula is designed to bring out an individual scent authentic to each user.
Tactile Design: We solved the "slippery soap" problem. The espresso grounds provide a superior grip in the shower, making it perfect for shaving and body prep.
Gentle & Safe: Our food-grade ingredients are safe for sensitive areas where traditional soaps are often too harsh.
I don't believe you should have to pay exorbitant prices for premium health and beauty products. That is why I am launching my pure, natural line—Hannah Holy Herbals (HHH)—this year.

By supporting this campaign, you aren't just buying a soap; you are supporting a business built on the core tenets of Sustainability, Transparency, and Connection. I am so enlivened to finally share this transformative secret with you and give you the opportunity to feel how amazing these products truly are.

project.name: UNCLE X – Turn your doorway into a wooden workout space.
project.description: Modular wall bars for your doorframe — no drilling. Individually cut to width and height by the user. Made in Germany. Wood Home Gym.

creator.name: Patrick Siehr
creator.biography:
I’m Patrick Siehr from Bergisch Gladbach, designer and developer of many Heimholz products. Together with Axel Siehr, I developed the UNCLE X DIY and built the prototype myself. We spent days and nights thinking, discarding ideas, starting over, testing, and refining — back and forth, up and down — until the product stood exactly as it does today.

I design products that don’t pull movement out of everyday life, but bring it back to where it belongs: into living spaces. I’m not interested in fitness equipment that takes up room or dominates an interior. I care about movement that is quiet, natural, and becomes a lasting part of daily life.

Together with Axel, we develop and build every prototype ourselves — from the first sketch through construction and material testing to a product we truly trust. We work with our hands, with wood, with real materials — not just on screens.

For this mindset, Patrick Siehr as a designer and Heimholz by Siehr as a brand were awarded the Green Product Award – Best of Interior & Lifestyle, selected by an international jury from over 1,500 submissions across 56 countries.

Wood is not a styling choice for us. It is a promise: durable, honest, and timeless.

With UNCLE X DIY, we continue this philosophy.
We have reimagined wall bars — space-saving, modular, and designed for real living spaces.

UNCLE X is not a fitness device.
It is a tool for everyday movement.

titre: UNCLE X – DIY The doorframe wall bars. Clamp in. Start moving. Made in Germany.
This video shows everything at a glance about the UNCLE X DIY doorframe wall bar.
The idea: movement where nothing usually happens
Clamp in. Start moving. No drilling.
Always fits — because you make it fit
Designed to stay — not to be hidden
Made in Germany. Built with intention.
Designed for real homes — and real people
10 reasons to choose UNCLE X
texte: UNCLE X — Turn unused space into everyday movement.
🏠 No drilling  🔧 Clamp-in system  📏 Cut to fit  🌳 Wood design  🇩🇪 Made in Germany

What if the space you walk through every day
could quietly change how you move, train, and live?
Just one overlooked place — reimagined.
📉 Limited space  🏙️ Small apartments  🏋️ Bulky equipment

Most people want to move more at home.
But everyday life gets in the way.

Classic wall bars?
They require free walls, drilling, and permanent commitment.

So movement gets postponed.
Again and again.
🚪 The doorframe
If your doorframe is 12 cm deep or deeper (including the rebate), the door can be closed and used normally as before.

Almost every home has it.
You pass through it every day — without noticing.
Until now.
🧠 Smart use of space  🧩 Everyday-ready
UNCLE X transforms your doorframe into a place for movement, strength, play, and daily activity.
⏱️ Installs in seconds  ❌🧱 No drilling  🔁 Easy to remove  🏢 Rental-friendly
UNCLE X installs in seconds by simply clamping it into your doorframe.
That means:

Your home stays your home.
Movement becomes part of it.
📐 Custom-sized by you  ✂️ DIY fit

No two doorframes are the same.
So UNCLE X isn’t fixed to one size.

You cut UNCLE X yourself to the exact width and height of your doorframe.
This creates a precise, secure fit — tailored to your space.
📏 Max width: 90 cm  📏 Max height: 206 cm
🪵 Wood design  🪑 Home-friendly
UNCLE X doesn’t look like fitness equipment.

Made from wood, calm in appearance and reduced in form,
it blends naturally into your living space.

More furniture.
Less gym.
🇩🇪 Produced in Germany  🛠️ CNC precision  🛡️ Built to last
UNCLE X DIY is developed and produced in Germany at Heimholz.

Precision CNC machining ensures perfectly fitting slots for the rungs.
The 30 mm cross-laminated wood is designed for strength and durability.
The rungs are made from solid tree trunks, planed to size and milled into an oval shape.
This provides an ergonomic grip and prevents the rungs from rotating once inserted.
High-quality side modules made from natural materials

The side modules are crafted from natural, untreated wood and stand out through precise workmanship, high stability, and a warm, natural appearance. This combination delivers functional quality while maintaining a timeless design that blends seamlessly into modern living spaces.
👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 For adults & kids  🧩 Modular system  🛡️ Design protected
Developers Axel Siehr and Patrick Siehr didn’t want to create another fitness device.
They wanted a system that integrates into everyday life.
UNCLE X is made for people who:

The goal was clear:
maximum modularity, minimal space, maximum possibilities
➕ Expandable  🔘 Gymnastic rings  ➖ Dip handles  📐 Incline board
With modular add-ons, UNCLE X grows with you.

It becomes:
✅ a climbing and play station for kids
✅ a powerful training setup for adults
✅ a visual highlight in your living space
consists of precisely CNC-milled side modules, a stable clamping mechanism, and matching adapters with routed slots for inserting the rungs. You only need to adjust the height to fit your door frame.
The set also includes two solid, oval-shaped wooden rungs made from high-quality birch wood. These rungs must be cut to the required width of your door frame by the user.

With the Starter Set, a wide range of exercises is already possible, including pull-ups, hanging leg raises, rows, static holds, shoulder and grip strength exercises, as well as various core and mobility movements. This makes the set a versatile foundation for functional doorway training.
The UNCLE-X Ring Set includes all components of the UNCLE-X Starter Set and expands it with additional equipment for more versatile and advanced training.

In addition to the precisely CNC-milled side modules, the stable clamping mechanism, and the matching adapters with routed slots for inserting the rungs, the set includes two gymnastic rings made from robust laminated wood.
It also comes with two wide and durable straps, each 5 m in length, featuring cam buckles for quick and secure length adjustment.
As with the Starter Set, the wooden rungs must be cut to the required width of the door frame by the user, while the height is individually adjusted to fit the doorway.

The UNCLE-X Ring Set significantly expands the range of possible exercises. In addition to classic movements such as pull-ups, rows, and static holds, the gymnastic rings enable ring push-ups, dips, muscle-up progressions, support holds, L-sits, front and back lever progressions, as well as a wide variety of core, stability, and shoulder mobility exercises.
In addition, a FREE HEIMHOLZ gym bag is included, allowing the gymnastic rings and straps to be neatly and safely stored when not in use.
The UNCLE-X DIP Set includes all components of the UNCLE-X Starter Set and expands it with additional elements for intensive upper-body and core training.

In addition to the precisely CNC-milled side modules, the stable clamping mechanism, and the matching adapters, the set includes one additional high-quality birch wood rung as well as two dip handles.

The dip handles offer a special adjustment feature, allowing them to be set to the user’s individual shoulder width for ergonomic and comfortable training.
To further improve stability, a wooden insert is glued into the rear of each handle, significantly reducing lateral (left-right) movement during exercises.
The dip handles are made from 30 mm thick laminated wood, making them especially robust, durable, and suitable for high loads.

The UNCLE-X DIP Set enables a wide range of exercises, including classic dip exercises, hanging leg raises, support holds, and various core-strength movements.
Because the dip handles can be mounted both higher and lower on the system, the set offers many additional training variations, allowing exercises to be adapted for different strength levels and movement patterns.
This makes the UNCLE-X DIP Set a powerful extension for functional strength training, calisthenics, and bodyweight workouts directly in the door frame.
The UNCLE-X Bench Set includes all components of the UNCLE-X Starter Set and expands it with a versatile training bench for strength, core, and mobility workouts.

In addition to the base system, the set includes a parallette (serving as the support base for the bench) and an incline board that can be used in multiple configurations.
The incline board can be mounted vertically as a backrest by hooking it directly into the rungs, or it can be positioned with one end attached to the rung system and the other resting on the parallette, creating a stable and functional fitness bench.
By repositioning the rungs, the bench angle can be adjusted to various incline levels, allowing a wide range of exercises and training intensities.
The parallette is constructed with extremely robust laminated wood side elements, while the grip is made from solid birch wood, providing excellent durability and a high-quality feel.

The incline board / fitness bench features a solid base plate and a comfortably padded surface.
The padding is finished with high-quality synthetic leather in a trendy vintage look, allowing the bench to blend seamlessly into many living spaces while conveying a premium and refined appearance.

The UNCLE-X Bench Set enables a wide variety of exercises, including sit-ups, crunches, incline core exercises, back extensions, leg raises, step-ups, Bulgarian split squats, push-up variations, core stability work, as well as mobility and stretching exercises.
Thanks to its adjustable incline, the set is suitable for both beginners and advanced functional training.

For all exercises and all types of load, always position yourself on the door side of the frame. This ensures that the doorway training system is pressed firmly into the door frame rather than being pulled out of it.

For swinging, dynamic, or momentum-based exercises, as well as when using the gymnastic rings with straps, we recommend additionally screwing the side panels to the door frame to increase overall stability.

With UNCLE X, we turn the doorframe into something new:
a dedicated place for movement, training, and family life — without cluttering your home.

Optional:
For extra security, UNCLE X can also be screwed into the doorframe.
One doorframe. One new training space.

I’m Patrick Siehr — designer and developer — and together with Axel Siehr, I am the brand owner of Heimholz by Siehr.
We develop and design all Heimholz products ourselves because we believe in an idea that is more important today than ever:
Everyone should have the opportunity to stay fit — regardless of space, living situation, or everyday routine.
Our products are created with the highest standards of functionality, quality, and design. Because we are convinced:

Fitness doesn’t have to be loud, bulky, or ugly.
It can be part of your living space — and blend harmoniously into real homes.

That’s exactly what UNCLE X stands for:
movement that fits your home.
Space-saving. Modular. Made of wood. And built for everyday life.
Design is not an extra — it’s essential

Many fitness products end up in a corner after a short time because they don’t fit into a home environment.
We believe: if movement is meant to become a lasting habit, the equipment needs to integrate aesthetically and functionally — not feel like an eyesore.
Responsibility doesn’t stop with the product

It’s also important to us to pack our products with as little plastic as possible.
We reduce plastic to the absolute minimum and rely on sustainable packaging solutions — because for us, quality isn’t only in the product itself, but also in how we treat resources.

project.name: Chosen by beauty
project.description: Luxury lip care rooted in confidence, intention, and everyday beauty.

creator.name: Chosen by beauty LLC
creator.biography: Chosen by Beauty is a luxury lip-care brand rooted in intention, confidence, and self-expression. We create elevated, clean glosses designed to flatter every tone and make everyday beauty feel powerful and personal.

texte: CHOSEN BY BEAUTY
Luxury Lip Gloss, Created With Intention
What We’re Creating

Chosen by Beauty is a luxury lip-care brand focused on one thing—exceptional lip gloss. Our debut collection features premium, hydrating, non-sticky lip glosses designed to enhance every skin tone while delivering a smooth, high-shine finish.
What makes Chosen different is intention. Every detail—from formulation to packaging—was thoughtfully designed to feel elevated, functional, and empowering.
This isn’t mass-produced beauty.
This is lip care you choose—on purpose.
Why We Care
Lip gloss is one of the most personal beauty products we use. It’s often the final touch before stepping out the door, walking into a meeting, or showing up for ourselves.

Yet many glosses feel sticky, lack hydration, or prioritize appearance over performance. Chosen was created to close that gap by delivering a product that performs beautifully while feeling indulgent and intentional.
We believe confidence starts with self-care—and that even small moments should feel meaningful.
The Product
Chosen lip glosses are designed to deliver:
Clean, nourishing formulas
Long-lasting hydration
Smooth, non-sticky shine
Universally flattering shades
Premium packaging with a built-in mirror and light for on-the-go use
Chosen focuses exclusively on lip products so we can do one thing—and do it exceptionally well.
How We’ll Make It Happen
The formulas are finalized. The packaging concepts are complete. The brand is ready.
Kickstarter funds will allow us to:
Produce the first manufacturing run
Finalize premium packaging
Launch marketing and fulfillment
Deliver a high-quality product to our backers
Every dollar raised will be used to bring Chosen to life and ensure a successful launch.
Who’s Behind Chosen
My name is Lisa, and I am the founder of Chosen by Beauty.

Chosen began as a personal vision rooted in confidence, identity, and the belief that nothing about us is accidental. I wanted to create a beauty brand that felt intentional, inclusive, and elevated—without compromising on quality or performance.
What’s Next
This first launch represents the foundation of Chosen by Beauty.
Long-term growth opportunities include thoughtful expansion into youth and men’s lip-care lines, following the successful launch of the core brand and maintaining a disciplined, focused approach.
For now, the priority is clear:
Launch beautifully
Deliver an exceptional product
Build trust with customers
Join Us
By backing Chosen by Beauty, you are supporting a brand built on intention, quality, and confidence.
Thank you for being part of this journey.
Welcome to Chosen.

project.name: RadRack Surfboard Rack – The Over-the-Tire Mount for SUVs
project.description: Built for surfers, by surfers a patented rear tire surfboard rack for SUVs like Bronco, Wrangler, Defender and more. Simple. Secure.

creator.name: Brian and Breanne
creator.biography:
We’re Brian and Breanne - partners, parents, and surfers who wanted a better way to get to the beach without compromising our vehicle or our family.
RadRack started as a practical solution to a real problem we were living with, and has grown into a product designed for surfers and everyday drivers around the world.

titre: The World's First Over-The-Tire Surfboard Rack
Designed for vehicles with rear-mounted spare tires
texte:
RadRack is the first over-the-tire surfboard rack designed for vehicles with rear-mounted spare tires.

It offers a simple, accessible way to carry surfboards—without roof racks, drilling, or compromises. Built for families, surfers, and everyday drivers, RadRack lets you use your vehicle the way it was meant to be used.

RadRack came from a problem we were living with as a family. We drive a Bronco with a soft top not by choice, but because hardtops weren’t available when we bought it. We still wanted to get our surfboards to the beach without putting the top down every time, without installing roof crossbars, and without loading boards inside the vehicle where our kids ride. Some people suggested strapping boards directly to the soft top, but that never felt right. The risk of damaging the top was real, and it wasn’t how we wanted to travel with our family. And it wasn’t just our situation. Whether you drive something older and well-loved or something brand new, most of us rely on our vehicles every day and we want to use them without worrying about unnecessary damage. No one wants to climb onto a roof, cram boards inside, or compromise just to get to the beach.
At the end of the day, it doesn’t matter what you drive. We’re all heading toward the same thing: waves.
That’s when we realized the spare tire was wasted space. Instead of forcing a roof solution that didn’t fit real life, we designed around the tire itself.
RadRack was born as a stable, accessible way to carry surfboards that just works.

RadRack mounts securely over your vehicle’s rear spare tire, creating a dedicated surfboard-carrying solution that’s easy to use and out of the way. It keeps boards accessible at the beach, off the roof, and out of the cabin without drilling into your vehicle or changing how you drive day to day. Designed with real-world surf trips in mind, RadRack works for quick sessions, family outings, and everyday driving.
RadRack has been developed with platforms like these in mind:
Final fit details will be shared prior to fulfillment as production is completed.

We’re launching RadRack on Kickstarter to fund our first production run and bring it to market responsibly. Your support helps us finalize manufacturing, produce our initial batch, and deliver RadRack directly to early backers around the world.

We’re Brian and Breanne, surfers, parents, and builders who wanted a better way to get to the beach without compromising our vehicle or our family. RadRack is the solution we couldn’t find, so we built it ourselves.

project.name: Basalto
project.description: A new Italian brand of clothing and accessories for bouldering and climbing.

creator.name: Stefano Borgia
creator.biography:
I’m a 32-year-old climber from Brianza, Italy—a region known as the "engine" of Italian industry and design, but also a historic hub for climbing culture and bouldering passion.

I grew up surrounded by the grit of local workshops and the limestone of our mountains. For years, I’ve felt that the climbing market was becoming stagnant, dominated by corporate giants that lost their connection to the rock. I decided it was time for a change.

Basalto is my response. It’s a project born from the desire to inject fresh air into the scene. I’m bringing the legendary Brianza work ethic—precision, quality, and innovation—into a brand that belongs to the community. I’m not just a designer; I’m the guy next to you at the crag, working on the same project, dreaming of gear that finally lives up to our passion.

titre: 1. THE ORIGIN STORY: A REBEL IN A GARAGE
2. OUR ETHICAL MANIFESTO: GREEN IS THE NEW BLACK
3. THE MONOLITH LINE: FOR EVERY SEND
4. THE SYMBOL: THE BASALTO SKULL
texte: BASALTO – The Monolith Series
Ethical, indestructible climbing apparel born in a garage. Built by a climber, for the community.
"I am a climber. I spend my days on the rocks and my nights in a garage."

I was tired of seeing the climbing market dominated by corporate giants, mass-producing fragile gear in unregulated factories. I wanted something different. I wanted gear that felt like the rock itself: raw, tough, and permanent.

Basalto started with a sewing machine, a pile of recycled Cordura, and a vision. We aren't here to build a multinational empire. We are here to bring a breath of fresh air to the climbing world—focusing on quality, soul, and the grit of the boulder.
2. OUR ETHICAL MANIFESTO: GREEN IS THE NEW BLACK
No Sweatshops, No Shortcuts: We refuse to exploit overseas labor. Our production is local, transparent, and fair.
Recycled & Repurposed: From recycled heavy-duty cotton to repurposed technical fibers, we give new life to materials that would otherwise be wasted.
Built for the "Forever": The most ecological product is the one you never throw away. Our "Monolith" line is designed to survive thousands of sessions.
Fast & Clean Shipping: No more waiting months for a package to cross the ocean. We ship fast, efficiently, and with minimal plastic packaging.
3. THE MONOLITH LINE: FOR EVERY SEND
Strength knows no gender."

The Monolith Series is designed for both Men and Women. Every cut, every seam, and every reinforcement has been tested by climbers of all shapes and sizes to ensure maximum mobility and a brutal, clean aesthetic.
Monolith Pants: Cordura-reinforced, diamond crotch, granite-tough.
Monolith Tee: Heavyweight organic cotton, boxy-fit, movement-focused.
Monolith Hoodie: Your thermal fortress, featuring our iconic Skull emblem.
4. THE SYMBOL: THE BASALTO SKULL
Memento Mori. Memento Vivere."
The Skull is our signature. It represents resilience, the awareness of our limits, and the fire to push past them. When you see this symbol on your gear, you know it was built to endure.
5. THE FUTURE: WHAT’S NEXT?
"This is just the first stone."
By backing this project, you aren't just buying a pair of pants. You are funding a revolution. Our roadmap includes:
Technical Accessories: Chalk bags (The Apex Skull) and brushes.
The Basalto Climbing Shoe: Already in development. A sustainable, high-performance shoe that will challenge everything you know about friction.

Ottimo, procediamo. Ecco la struttura definitiva per la tua campagna Kickstarter di Basalto. È pensata per essere visivamente d'impatto e carica di significato, mettendo in chiaro che sei tu contro i colossi del settore.
Project Title: BASALTO – The Monolith Series
Subtitle: Ethical, indestructible climbing apparel born in a garage. Built by a climber, for the community.
Questa sezione serve a creare empatia. Sei tu, la tua passione e il tuo laboratorio.
"I am a climber. I spend my days on the rocks and my nights in a garage."

Basalto started with a sewing machine, a pile of recycled Cordura, and a vision. We aren't here to build a multinational empire. We are here to bring a breath of fresh air to the climbing world—focusing on quality, soul, and the grit of the boulder.
Qui colpiamo duramente sui valori: sostenibilità reale e rispetto per i lavoratori.

Specifichiamo che è una linea per tutti, senza distinzioni.

Monolith Pants: Cordura-reinforced, diamond crotch, granite-tough.
Monolith Tee: Heavyweight organic cotton, boxy-fit, movement-focused.
Monolith Hoodie: Your thermal fortress, featuring our iconic Skull emblem.

Creiamo hype per quello che verrà dopo il successo della campagna.
"This is just the first stone."
By backing this project, you aren't just buying a pair of pants. You are funding a revolution. Our roadmap includes:
Technical Accessories: Chalk bags (The Apex Skull) and brushes.
The Basalto Climbing Shoe: Already in development. A sustainable, high-performance shoe that will challenge everything you know about friction.
THE SUPPORTER: Digital thanks + Basalto Skull Sticker Pack.
THE TEE PACK: 1x Monolith Tee (Men/Women).
THE CRAG PACK: 1x Monolith Pants.
THE FULL MONOLITH: Pants + Tee + Hoodie (The ultimate setup).

project.name: Pride Cats Enamel Pins: a floral black cat collection
project.description: A fabulous Pride themed cat enamel pin collection, with apparel, key chain and sticker add-ons! Made by Glitter Punk.

creator.name: Glitter Punk
creator.biography:
Hi! I'm Sarah, an illustrator and pin-maker based in Reading, UK and the woman behind Glitter Punk.

The body of my work focuses on animals (with other elements of witchy-ness, feminism and the odd pun thrown in for good measure!) I often like to play with the concept of opposites – day and night, black and white, and animals adorned with flowers.

People buy my accessories for so many reasons - whether to add to a pin collection, as a reminder of a pet, or as a gift for friends or family. I hear my customers say again and again how thrilled they are with their pieces; using them either as a fun way to express themselves or to show their affection to a loved one.

texte: Hi there! I’m Sarah, an illustrator based in Reading and the woman behind Glitter Punk! I create pins and other cute accessories – especially cats and other animals. To see more of my existing work check out my website, Etsy, Instagram or Facebook.

After my last 8 successful Kickstarters I’m now super excited to launch my newest campaign in one of my most asked after themes - Pride! I’m planning to send these out in May so that everybody has them for June!
The pins will be:

🖤       37mm – 49mm (1.45” – 1.77”)
🖤       Made from gold hard enamel
🖤       Have a special campaign backstamp
🖤       Come with colourful and/or heart shaped rubber pin backs
🖤      Be presented on a unique set of backing cards
The first 3 pins Lesbian, MLM and Bisexual Pride Cats make up my main campaign target, with an extra 6 pins as exciting stretch goals!
By pledging in this campaign you can bring these amazing designs to life whilst helping to support my small business, for which I will be super grateful!
Make a pledge to receive the pins of your choice! Higher pledge tiers will have free stickers as extras!
My initial goal is for £2,000 to fund the first 3 pins. The more raised, the more pins will go into production! NOTE: All pins are now unlocked!
This is an all-or-nothing campaign, so you won’t be charged right until the end of the campaign.

Early bird prices will be available for the first 24 hours – tiers are available for all of the designs so pledge straight away to get the best deal, and increase the chance of all the pins getting unlocked!
I’ll be donating 15% of profits (after production costs, shipping, taxes ect.) from this campaign to two LGBTIA+ organisations  - The Trevor Project and the ACLU (American Civil Liberties Union).

I’ve chosen to support the Trevor Project as it has a huge direct impact on young LGBTQIA people, and the ACLU as one of the biggest organisations fighting to progress (and often halt the dismantling) of LGBTQIA rights. Which is needed right now more than ever!
Pledge for at least 3 pins, and you’ll get 2-10 stickers completely FREE!
I’m super excited to say anybody who pledges for at least 3 pins will get 2 stickers completely FREE!
Pledge for 4 pins to get 3 free stickers, 6 pins to get 4 free stickers, 8 pins to get 6 free stickers, and if you pledge for the full set of pins you’ll get all 10 stickers, completely free!
If you want even more, you can add these cuties during your pledge! Or, to add them later click ‘Manage your pledge > Change your pledge’ to bring up the Add-ons!
I’m super excited to offer clothes again for this campaign! All clothes are only available as an add-on, and will be available right from the start of the campaign.

I’m offering the amazing Rainbow Pride Hoodie in black, the MLM Pride Hoodie in navy and the Bisexual Pride Hoodie in black for just £65 each! Heavily embroidered, this thick hoodie feels lovely to wear! It’s in a relaxed unisex cut, and available in inclusive sizing from S – 4XL.
Add a black hoodie in the Lesbian Pride design for £55!
They are in a unisex cut and available in inclusive sizing up to 4XL! Made from a cotton mix, these super soft hoodies feel amazing to wear!

I’m also very excited to offer T-shirts in the Rainbow & Bisexual Pride designs too, for just £25 each! They are 100% cotton and available in a relaxed female fit in sizes S – 2XL, and unisex from S – 5XL.
Hoodie & Sweatshirt Sizes

S: 36" chest
M: 40" chest
L: 44" chest
XL: 48" chest
2XL: 52" chest
3XL: 56" chest
4XL: 60" chest

You can also add a keychain to your pledge for just £12 each! Measuring approx. 55mm – keeping to a larger size! There will be a slight size variance between designs to keep them all looking proportional to each other.
All of the cuties from the campaign will be available as an add-on.
They will come in double sided clear acrylic, with a pink heart clasp and a secondary pink lips charm attached.
Mini Sticker Sets are just £5 each!
I’ll also be selling the Single Stickers – choose any sticker to add to your pledge, for just £5 each!
Single stickers are great for laptops or notebooks, measuring around 80 - 100mm (3.3 – 4”) depending on the design.
February  – Kickstarter Launch
March – Campaign Ends & Surveys sent out
Late-March - Funds Received & Production Starts
Late-April – Production ends, checking, backing & packing
Mid-May – Shipping (in time for Pride Month!)
🖤       Production: 60%
🖤       Kickstarter & Card Processing Fees: 10%
🖤       Packaging: 10%
🖤       Postage: 20%
I am based in the UK. I’m offering rewards to people in the UK, USA, EU Canada, Australia, New Zealand & South Korea.
If you’re not on this list do send me a message and I’ll see what I can do!
Postage is FREE to the UK and USA, and will cost £3.00 extra for everywhere else.

Tariffs will be charged after the campaign during the survey process – please put aside 10% of the value of your pledge for this if you are based in the USA! I will be able to confirm the exact % just before the survey goes out.
UK VAT is included in the price.

For everywhere else in the world you will need to budget for taxes and processing fees set by your national government and postal carrier. These vary by country so please do check your own country’s rules in advance!
Once dispatched the pins should be delivered:
🖤 UK: 2-7 working days
🖤 EU: 1-6 weeks
🖤 USA: 2-3 weeks
🖤 Canada, Australia and New Zealand: 2-6 weeks
How do I select which pins I want?
Once you’ve decided on the quantity then make a pledge for that number (such as 3 pins). At the end of the campaign a survey will be sent out and you can choose which pins you receive!
I might buy them after the campaign has finished. Will they go into your shop?

It completely depends on numbers. The best way to guarantee access to a pin is to pledge now! If lots of people interested but don’t actually pledge, it will reduce the likelihood I can make all 8 pins, so I encourage you to go for it!
Can I add more early bird pins?
The early bird pins will be available ONLY for 24 hours – so make sure you pledge for everything you want during the early bird period!
Can I combine Kickstarter rewards with other items from your regular shop?
To simplify shipping I’m not combining my normal items with Kickstarter rewards.
Can I order more than one of the same design?

Absolutely! There’s no restriction on ordering what you like, so for example if you wanted 3 of the same design just select the 3 pin pledge level, and you can request 3 of the same pin during the survey.
Can I pledge for locked pins?
Yes! Please do pledge for as many pins as you would ultimately like. The only way to get them unlocked is people to pledge towards them!
Here are some of the enamel pins I’ve produced and currently sell through my own website, Etsy and to retail shops:
In addition, here are the pins from my Corvid campaign in November 2025:
And my Book Cats Kickstarter in February 2025:
Manufacturing

Manufacturing products always come with an element of risk. However as a veteran pin maker I have successfully produced 258 pins since 2017, so I am super confident I will be able to bring the pins from this campaign to life, to a high quality and on schedule!
Postal delays

Sometimes post can be delayed by issues such as strikes, natural disasters, global pandemics and so on. I’ve traded to the world since 2015, and have experienced all of the above! Generally they will result in a slight slowdown but almost everybody does get their parcel delivered.

If your parcel is lost, stolen or unreasonably delayed (where the parcel hasn’t arrived more than 10 days after dispatch to the UK, 3 weeks to the USA, and 7 weeks for Canada, Australia and New Zealand) I will provide a replacement.
Refunds & cancellations
If you don’t fill out the survey within 3 months your pledge will be counted as a donation, refunds will not be available after this time.

I will use BackerKit after the campaign to collect which pins you want, and you’ll be able to continue editing your address up until it’s time to ship. You are responsible for entering an address which you will be able to receive post to, for at least 8 weeks after shipping.

comments.text: Excited to back another Glitter Punk Kitty Kickstarter!! C’mon, let’s get to £7000!! 🏳️‍🌈

project.name: KarinaJ Denim: Slip-on Jeans that Adapt to You
project.description: We use a slip-on design to create jeans that adapt to daily life. We deserve jeans that fit us all day long

creator.name: Karina Gupta
creator.biography: Hi, I’m Karina — a Yale MBA candidate and former McKinsey consultant and Microsoft PM. And just like you, I dreaded putting on jeans every day. I knew there had to be a better option, so I set out to build jeans that actually work for real life

texte: KarinaJ Denim started with a frustration I couldn’t shake.

Women’s bodies change constantly. Our weight can fluctuate by up to five pounds in a single day due to hormones, stress, travel, water retention, or simply life. Traditional jeans, however, are built around buttons and zippers—structures that are inherently rigid. No matter how much stretch is added to the fabric, jeans are still designed to fit a single moment in time, not an entire day.
I knew there had to be something better.

KarinaJ exists between those two extremes. We are building premium, slip-on jeans designed to adapt to real women’s bodies and real lives — jeans that look polished enough for work or dinner, feel good all day, and don’t punish you when your body changes.

From the beginning, I was intentional about how these jeans would be made. I source our denim from the same mill used by many premium brands, and we manufacture right here in Los Angeles, ensuring ethical wages, better oversight, and a more sustainable production process. Comfort shouldn’t come at the cost of craftsmanship — or values.
So you might be curious when this journey started.

In January 2023, I flew to New York to attend Kingpins, the world’s largest sustainable denim trade show. I didn’t go with a finished plan — just a lot of questions. That trip pulled me into the mechanics of denim and helped me see that this not a fashion problem but a product problem

Over the next three years, I obsessively worked on getting it right. My house filled with fabric swatches as mills mailed denim samples back and forth. I hired a former Levi’s designer to land on the right fabric and core design, iterated through six rounds of prototypes, and hosted fittings with the input of a technical designer from Athleta to master fit and function. I even went through two manufacturers before finding one that could truly execute the vision.

This past year was about pressure-testing every detail. I ran three fittings across all sizes, and at one point had to move a fitting — and nearly move it again — because the wash was slightly off. The jeans technically worked, but they were not right. I chose to wait. In denim, small details matter.

One of the most nerve-wracking parts of this journey was not making the product but sharing it. For a long time, I was afraid to put these jeans into the world, unsure how they would be received. When I finally did, the response surprised me. Women immediately understood the problem and embraced these jeans with open arms.
At pre-launch parties, I had women say "I wish I could take these home today" or "These are the most comfortable jeans I have ever worn."
Hearing this over and over made one thing very clear: I didn't want this to stay a side project or quiet launch
That’s why I’m launching KarinaJ Denim on Kickstarter.

This campaign helps fund our first production run and brings you into the process from the beginning. We’re launching with four styles — a straight leg and a bootcut leg, each in light and dark washes — designed to look polished, feel good all day, and adapt when your body changes.
So if you’ve ever wished your jeans worked with you instead of against you, I built these jeans for you <3

gone.name: Bronze Supporter
gone.desc: Your support helps bring KarinaJ to life. This contribution goes directly toward funding our next production run—covering fabric sourcing, sampling refinements, and minimums that help us scale responsibly. You’re helping ensure these jeans exist beyond the first launch, and I’m truly grateful you’re part of the journey.

gone.name: Gold Supporter
gone.desc: This contribution supports creative and brand-building efforts, including future photoshoots, fit testing on real women, and storytelling content that helps KarinaJ reach more people. You’re investing not just in jeans, but in building a brand that women can see themselves in. Thank you for believing in this vision.

project.description: A beautiful, cherry blossom flower sweater with embroidered sleeves and shoulders designed by Tsumomoca

creator.name: Tsumomoca
creator.biography: Hi I'm Momoca who runs Tsumomoca. I'm an independent artist who aims to bring a little bit of happiness into your everyday lives.

texte: Hello everyone! Super excited to start my second design of my embroidered apparel line. I’m Tsumomoca, an independent illustrator and designer. In this next project, the flowers are Sakuras!

As you know, Kickstarter is an All-or-Nothing system so please consider backing for the best chance of bringing this project to life! In doing so, you will be supporting a small business which I truely appreciate!

Through the funds from Kickstarter, it will help cover the cost of fulfilling the MOQ(minimum order quantity) production that my manufacturer requires, tariff fees, Kickstarter fees, and delivery to my California location.
February - April 2026
May 2026
July 2026
Same material, fit, style, and embroidery.

Please everyone make this one be a big hit finally so maybe we can get different colored jackets 😂

project.name: Cathulu and Friends Screen Printed Pins!
project.description: Cathulu, a mischievous, brain eating cat companion, now has regional variants! Find your Lovcraftian horror house cat!

creator.name: Katelyn McCaigue
creator.biography: Hey I'm Katelyn! I am a monster fanatic and love drawing my own original creatures and D&D stuff! I currently works as a full time graphic designer and a part time YouTuber and illustrator.

titre: Welcome Cat Lovers and Lovecraftian Horror Fans!
Introducing...Cathulu from Around the World!
How will this campaign work with unlocking designs?
texte: Hi! My name is Katelyn McCaigue and I am an illustrator from Arizona. I have had five successful Kickstarter projects with two being enamel pin campaigns. Cathulu is one of my OG creatures from my D&D monster books and a top seller for my stickers. I have been wanting to design regional variants of my grumpy little dude since there are so many cool octopus and squid in our world!
This collection includes eight different Cathulu designs based off of real octopus and squid from our world.
These high quality hard enamel, screen-printed pins are set to scale to be to size with each other. That way the chonkers are big and the kittens are small!
By supporting these pins on Kickstarter, you will be receiving a 25% discount from my final retail price and additional savings with greater quantity packs.

You will also be directly supporting me, an independent artist, with my next round of merchandise for conventions. The funds raised will help me print 100 of each design when they are unlocked. This will give me extra stock for going in future con seasons and help my small business get new product lines up!
