project.name: Lil Scotty and Lil Lysol’s new album DONT POKE THE BEAR
project.description: We’re Lil Scotty and Lil Lysol—two independent artists starting Bear Gang Records. We’re setting out to create a full album in 7 Days!

creator.name: Lil Scotty
creator.biography: Hey I’m lil Scotty

texte: Don’t Poke the Bear — Why We’re Creating This Album
My name is Lil Scotty, and I’m creating an album called Don’t Poke the Bear with my friend and collaborator Lil Lysol, under our independent label Bear Gang Records.

This project started as a challenge I’ve carried with me for years. I’ve always wanted to create an album in 24 hours — something raw, instinctive, and impossible to overthink. I’ve always believed the best art comes from pressure, momentum, and trusting your first instinct.

Life made me realize 24 hours wasn’t realistic, but I refused to let the idea die. Instead of giving up on it, I expanded the challenge to 7 days. Same urgency. Same intensity. Just enough space to do it right without losing the raw energy that made the idea special in the first place.
What “Don’t Poke the Bear” Means to Us

The title Don’t Poke the Bear is playful on the surface, but it carries a deeper meaning for us. It represents being underestimated, staying calm, and knowing when to move. We don’t need to be loud to be confident — but once tested, we stand our ground.
That energy defines Bear Gang Records. We’re not forcing attention. We’re building something real, on our own terms, with people we trust.
This album reflects that balance between humor and confidence. It’s fun, it’s honest, and it’s unapologetically us.
Why Bear Gang Records Exists

Bear Gang Records isn’t a traditional label. It’s a foundation built by friends who believe in each other’s creativity. There are no executives, no corporate rules — just accountability, trust, and shared vision.

Every decision on this album is being made by the people creating it. That freedom allows us to take risks, keep the music honest, and capture moments as they happen instead of polishing the life out of them.
How We’re Creating the Album
We’re committing to creating, recording, and finishing Don’t Poke the Bear in 7 days.

That means trusting our instincts, writing fast, recording while the energy is fresh, and letting moments live even if they’re imperfect. Some songs will come together in a single session. Others will evolve naturally over the week.
The time limit forces honesty. It forces focus. It keeps us present.
Why We’re Asking for Support
Even when you’re independent, creating an album still comes with real costs — studio time, mixing, mastering, artwork, distribution, and promotion all add up.

This GoFundMe exists to help us bring Don’t Poke the Bear to life without compromising the vision behind it. Every contribution goes directly into finishing the album the right way and making sure it reaches people who connect with the energy.
What This Album Represents
Don’t Poke the Bear represents a moment in time for both of us. It’s about trusting ourselves, working together, and proving that creativity doesn’t need permission.
This album is a statement from Bear Gang Records — not just about music, but about independence, community, and building something real from the ground up.
Thank You for Being Part of This

Whether you donate, share, or just take the time to read this, we appreciate you more than we can say. Your support helps us turn a raw idea into a finished project and move one step closer to our vision.
Don’t poke the bear.
But if you do… just know we’re ready.

project.name: from my heart… — journey of becoming & the beauty of life
project.description: A solo cello album about becoming, beauty, and the privilege of being alive; recorded with orchestra, choir, and deep sincerity

creator.name: Cremaine Booker
creator.biography: Cremaine Booker is a cellist, composer, and producer creating cinematic, heart-forward music. His work blends orchestral sound, interior reflection, and storytelling; music shaped by lived experience, gratitude, and the quiet act of becoming

titre: Why I’m making this album now
Why I’m asking for your support
How the album will be made
texte: For the past few years I’ve been quietly dreaming and writing an album called from my heart… It began as a private thing. A place to hold the parts of life that don’t fit on stage or online. Somewhere along the way it became bigger. It became about becoming; about the quiet miracle of being alive, about grief and gratitude, about understanding yourself after surviving the things you’ve survived.
This album isn’t a performance. It’s the most honest and vulnerable thing I’ve ever made.

from my heart… only exists because of the life I’ve lived up to this moment. I’m at a point in my life and career where I finally have something to say and the tools to say it. If I wait, it becomes another story. I believe this is the moment to tell it, and to tell it fully.
This project is about listening to that quiet inner voice that says: this matters now.

from my heart… is a solo cello album with orchestra, choir, and more. It moves like a film score, breathes like chamber music, and feels like late-night reflection. It’s not about virtuosity. It’s about interiority; the quiet things we live through, understand, and continue from.
The cello serves as the narrator. The orchestra becomes breath and environment. The choir is there to elevate meaning.

This album is for anyone who has lived, loved, lost, healed, wondered, or continued. It’s for people who pay attention to the quiet things. It’s for people who feel deeply but don’t always know how to say it. It’s for people still learning how to be alive.

To make this album the way it needs to be made; with a real orchestra, a real choir, and real musicians in the room, I need help. Recording orchestral music at this scale is expensive. It’s also worth it.
I’m asking for partnership. If you choose to support this project, you’re not just helping me make an album. You’re helping bring something honest and beautiful into the world.
Every dollar raised in this Kickstarter goes directly into making the album possible, including:
Hiring professional orchestra players
Hiring a 16-voice choir
Hiring a rhythm section
Studio time
Engineering, mixing, and mastering
I’m writing the music, orchestrating, arranging, copying parts, and producing everything myself to keep costs down. The goal is to capture the music in its full scale. The way it deserves to live.

The album will be recorded in dedicated studio sessions with professional musicians, focused on capturing real performances in a shared space.This is not a piecemeal or remote project. It’s about presence, listening, and human connection in the room.
Backers will receive updates throughout the process, including behind-the-scenes moments, reflections, and progress as the album comes to life.

I’m Cremaine. A cellist, composer, and producer whose work lives at the intersection of classical, cinematic, and contemporary music. I’ve spent years performing, collaborating, and creating across a wide range of musical worlds, but from my heart… is the most personal project I’ve undertaken. I’m writing, orchestrating, arranging, copying parts, and producing this album myself to ensure it stays true to its intention. This project reflects not just my musical voice, but the life experience that shaped it. I’m committed to seeing it through with care, transparency, and gratitude.

Recording will begin shortly after the campaign concludes. From there, the process will move through mixing, mastering, and final delivery. My priority is quality, care, and transparency, not rushing the work.
Backers will be kept informed at every stage.
If we exceed the funding goal, additional support will allow for expanded orchestration, additional studio time, and deeper refinement of the final recordings.
If the project goes beyond that goal, every additional dollar will be used to deepen, not inflate, the album.
Here’s what becomes possible in a perfect world.
$70,000 — Expanded orchestration

This level allows for additional orchestral players and expanded string textures across the album. More harmonic depth, more counterpoint, and more room for the music to breathe. The album becomes wider, richer, and more immersive.
$75,000 — Additional studio time
This unlocks extra recording time with the orchestra and rhythm section.More time in the room means:
fewer compromises
deeper listening
more nuance captured in each performance
This is about letting moments fully arrive instead of rushing past them.
$80,000 — Enhanced choir recording
At this level, we’re able to expand the choir presence in the final track and spend more time shaping vocal blends, dynamics, and atmosphere.
The choir becomes not just a color, but a living, breathing culmination of the album’s emotional arc.
$85,000 — Live session documentation
This stretch goal allows us to professionally document portions of the recording sessions through video and photography.
Backers will gain access to behind-the-scenes moments that capture the humanity of the process; musicians in the room, listening, responding, creating together.
This isn’t content for promotion. It’s a record of how the album came to life.
$90,000 — Mixing and mastering at the highest level

At this level, we can bring in additional expertise and time for mixing and mastering to ensure the album translates beautifully across all listening environments; headphones, speakers, quiet rooms, and large spaces.
The goal here is longevity: an album that sounds as good ten years from now as it does on first listen.
$100,000 — A complete artistic document
This is the dream version.
At this level, from my heart… becomes not just an album, but a fully realized artistic document. Recorded, mixed, mastered, documented, and preserved at the highest level possible.
Nothing flashy. Nothing excessive. Just the fullest, most honest version of the work.
A note about stretch goals
Stretch goals will never change the spirit of the album. Every decision beyond the base goal will be made in service of the music, the musicians, and the listeners who helped bring it into the world.
Thank you for reading. Thank you for caring.
Thank you for considering being part of this.
I don’t take any of it lightly.
from my heart… to yours.
— Cremaine

project.name: Hildegard Reanimated: Vision in Vision Album Release
project.description: The Pandora Consort presents an album of their concert program, Hildegard Reanimated: Vision in Vision.

creator.name: The Pandora Consort
creator.biography:
A new kind of early music ensemble. 

The Pandora Consort reimagines classical music performance by integrating multimedia, interactive elements, and exploring historically underrepresented repertoire.

texte: Click here to listen to single, O viridissima virga, on Bandcamp.

In Hildegard Reanimated: Vision in Vision, The Pandora Consort explores the mystical visions of Hildegard von Bingen through her illuminations and music. Taking inspiration from her life, we weave them together in a concert program focused on four of her most famous visions that influenced her spiritual philosophy. Working with visual artist Cate Duckwall to bring these visions to life, this concert features music from Hildegard’s vast oeuvre accompanied by artistic animations of key illuminations, creating a multimedia experience.

Our love for Hildegard's music comes directly from our mentor and friend, Pamela Dellal. She has taught us everything we know about singing Hildegard – the rules (and how to break them), the deep mind-body connection one must cultivate to really do it right, and the utter joy the process can bring. This music is simultaneously human and otherworldly; it's something you've heard before and something you haven't all at once. Thank you, Pam, for helping us access it.

We sing this program in the coolest places: in dusty basements, at small independent bookstores, in stone chapels, in huge and tiny churches, at art galleries, on the radio, during yoga classes, in poetry publishing houses, on Broadway. We meet and befriend the coolest people doing this work: Elaine and Chandler, Laura and Meyer, Helen, Josh, Nancy, Karlye, Alexandre, Bianca and Ben, Jane and Will, Emily, Gene, Dennis, Christine.

Our relationship with In-Situ Polyculture's Candace Jensen has grown really strong; her belief in our work and forward-thinking creative energy are the driving forces behind the release of this album. Without her, we wouldn't have a wonderful relationship with Epsilon Spires in Brattleboro VT, who provide a concert venue and recording space for us. Thanks to Candace, Jamie Mohr, Saleem Mizrachi, and Rob Forman at Sedimental Records, we have a record to share with you all!
With recording and releasing music comes costs. The $3,500 we are raising will pay for the following:

With each donation of $10 or higher, you'll be placed into a reward tier, gaining you immediate access to the digital download of the album as well as a piece (or two) of physical media (it will take a few months for the vinyl pressing, so we wanted to thank you for your patience with access to the album via Bandcamp). Check out the reward tiers for more info, and thank you for your support.

comments.text: Hey 👋

project.name: Moments of Japan: Street Photography Book
project.description: A curation of atmospheric street photography capturing fleeting, unposed moments of Japan.

creator.name: Chris Rayson
creator.biography:
I’m a designer and photographer from the UK. Over the last three years I’ve explored various regions of Japan, capturing unscripted scenes that unfold after dark.

Moments of Japan is the result: a curated photobook focusing on unposed, fleeting moments, from passing glances to the shifting rhythms and energy of Japan at night.

texte: Thanks for visiting! Moments of Japan is a photobook curating a collection of street scenes I captured across Japan between 2023–2025. More than just a visual record, it’s my personal reflection on the atmosphere and energy of Japan’s streets at night.

This all began in March 2023, on my first trip exploring Kantō, Chūbu, Kansai, and Chūgoku. Like many, I was drawn in by the food, culture and hospitality — but what stayed with me most was the contrast; neon and noise on the surface, with moments of stillness hidden away in the quiet backstreets. 

That visit left a lasting impression. So I returned, twice more over the following years, discovering new places and slowly building what would become this book.

Since then, I’ve been sharing glimpses on Instagram, but I always felt the images deserved something more tangible. A slower, quieter space to breathe.

That’s what Moments of Japan is. A curated photobook threading together night-time scenes, from cosy corners in Kyoto to the neon chaos of Tokyo. It's not a guidebook or a misleading photoshopped fantasy, but an honest attempt to capture the presence and atmosphere of the in-between.

Above all, it’s my way of honouring a place I’ve come to care about deeply. And with your support, turning these scenes into something lasting.

The core reward is the First Edition casebound photobook featuring 86 carefully selected images across 160 pages, divided into six thematic chapters including Light 灯, Flow 流れ, and Solitude 孤独. Each chapter explores a different visual thread using minimal text and clean layouts to let each scene breathe.

I'm designing the book to feel quiet and immersive. Something you can return to slowly, page by page. And to ensure it's created with the utmost quality, I'll be working with a professional UK book printer to produce a beautifully crafted edition you'll be proud to display.

For collectors who want something extra special, I’ve designed a Deluxe Edition that celebrates the craft behind the book. With premium finishes, a tactile cover, and a few personal touches to make it truly one of a kind. This includes a raised gold foil title, a custom designed Obi Strip, and other carefully chosen embellishments like Japanese patterned endpapers, heavier stock, a reading ribbon, and head & tail binding bands.
Same core content as the First Edition with the following premium extras:

Each reward is designed to offer something meaningful, whether it's early backer pricing or the Kickstarter-exclusive collector’s set. Some tiers are limited, so if one catches your eye don’t wait too long.

Early Backer Price
A special price of the First Edition, reserved for the first 20 backers.

First Edition
The hardback photobook showcasing 86 photographs across 160 pages in full colour.

Book + Six Mini Moments (A6 Print Set)
First Edition and 6 x A6 art prints, matt-laminated on heavyweight 400gsm silk stock.

Book + Limited Edition A4 Signed Giclée Print
The First Edition and a striking A4 giclée print, professionally printed with high-quality pigment ink on museum-grade archival paper. Includes a signed and hand numbered certificate of authenticity, only 30 available.

Deluxe Collector’s Set
The Deluxe Edition of the book with premium finishes and carefully chosen embellishments including a soft-touch cover, raised gold foil title, custom obi strip, reading ribbon, head & tail binding bands, and Japanese inspired patterned end papers.
Limited to only 20 backers worldwide, this edition also includes:
Every pledge helps make this book a reality. Whether you back it with £1 or choose the Deluxe Set, I’m incredibly grateful for your support.

Hello! I’m Chris, a designer and photographer from the UK.

I’ve spent 15 years working across visual design, print and digital products. In recent years photography has become an equally important creative outlet for me. It’s a way of observing the world more slowly and noticing the details we usually pass by.

That slower pace deepened during my time in Japan, especially at night. There’s something about the atmosphere: the quiet, the chaos, the mix of stillness and movement. I’ve been documenting these scenes for three years which now form the heart of this book.

Moments of Japan brings together my love of Japanese culture, observational photography, and printed design. It’s a project I’ve wanted to create for a long time, and I’m excited to finally share it with your help.
Here’s how the timeline looks going forward:
These may vary slightly by location and reward tier, but current estimates are:

All shipping fees will be calculated and collected after the campaign via BackerKit based on final weights and real-world courier rates. Books will be securely packed in rigid cardboard mailers and sent with tracked delivery to help ensure they arrive safely.

Due to customs restrictions, standard post may not be available. I’ll likely ship via courier (DHL, UPS, etc). Costs may be higher, but all orders will include tracking. I will keep these as fair and accurate as possible.

Due to postal restrictions I won’t be able to ship to:
Afghanistan, Belarus, Cuba, Iran, Iraq, Israel, Palestine, Kazakhstan, Russia, South Africa, South America (all countries), Syria, Ukraine, or Venezuela.
If your country isn’t listed when selecting your shipping destination, or has known restrictions, feel free to message me and I’ll do my best to help.
Stay connected for exclusive updates and previews during the process.

project.name: Inspired by Shibari Chapter 10 Erotic Art Nude Photobook
project.description: NSFW Project with great apreciation for the great art of shibari AKA Kinbaku through artworks: photobook, video and painting

creator.name: Labour De Art
creator.biography: Artist

texte: Inspired by Shibari is a photobook, video and painting project.

Shibari, also known as Kinbaku is an ancient art from Japan. Originally used as a method of restraining captives, then it evolved as a form of art. The literal meaning of Kinbaku is "the beauty of tight binding". Nowadays this form of art is practised worldwide.

Me as an artist was first introduced to Shibari in Asia, where professional Shibari performers made live shows, then I saw photographers in France and UK. This was a great inspiration for me to practise this form of art both in photography and painting.
The model will pose nude using the main shibari element, natural Jute rope of 6mm diameter.
In the rewards section : The photobook, Videos and the painting.
In the Add-ons: Polaroids (Instax Wide Film), a Gimbal Video and Ropes.
Thank you

project.name: PHOTOSTORIES+ No.22 - Ed.1 - Nude Art Book
project.description: Alba - Fast Food Encounter

creator.name: 017_PRESS
creator.biography: this is Alex, professional photographer.  I love the arts, I love nice people and I love our planet.

texte: This campaign introduces a new chapter in the renewed PHOTOSTORIES+ photographic series — visual narratives born from spontaneous, lightly arranged encounters, often with first-time models.

PHOTOSTORIES+ is not limited to a single publication.
Each chapter begins on the book — and continues inside a private online archive created exclusively for supporters.

Story No.22 is released as a limited-edition, certified eBook conceived as a true collector’s piece. Alongside this, it offers an expanded and interactive experience through photostoriesplus.com, a protected space where the complete PHOTOSTORIES+ journey unfolds beyond the eBook limits.
As the 22nd chapter in the series, this story moves deeper — more immersive, more personal, and more engaging than ever before.
Alba isn’t a standard beauty — and she doesn’t try to be. Our encounter was accidental and fleeting, the kind meant to disappear.

A cancelled train at Madrid Atocha left me with time to kill, so I crossed into a nearly empty McDonalds. She was already there, alone and unhurried. Conversation followed naturally. Beneath her unusual appearance, Alba’s lively innocence emerged — raw yet graceful, playful yet strong. Her charm isn’t a stereotype; it lives in contrast.

Alba was twenty-one and about to leave Madrid, suspended — like me — between departures. When the camera came out, she changed completely: instinctive, bold, defiant and fun. The situation grew visually intense, as if the lens had unlocked something.
Parts of this encounter — moments too intimate for print — continue inside the PHOTOSTORIES+ private archive.
Some stories don’t need time. They only need to happen.
PHOTOSTORIES+ No.22 Ed.1 - Alba - Fast Food Encounter

PHOTOSTORIES+ No.22 — Collector’s Edition eBook (Edition 1)
A limited, certified digital photobook featuring intimate imagery, presented in a fully handmade, AI-free design and conceived as a true collector’s piece.
(Available only during Campaign No.22)
Behind-the-scenes photographs
A curated selection of 100 high-resolution images
A selection of personally edited, intimate video footage from the shoot
The heart of PHOTOSTORIES+
One month of private access to photostoriesplus.com, including:
Exclusive NEW Gallery No.22 — 20 further deeply personal photos and videos not included in the eBook
Content created specifically for the private archive and not shared publicly
The complete PHOTOSTORIES+ archive, with all chapters accessible anytime, anywhere

🔒 This experience exists only inside the private archive.
The eBook captures the story. The archive allows it to continue.
Past PHOTOSTORIES (Edition 2) chapters
Special Issues No.15, 16, and 17, featuring additional exclusive imagery
Never-before-seen sets featuring selected models
Each add-on includes 15 exclusive images
Real Women. Real Stories.

Each PHOTOSTORIES+ chapter features real women in environments that are meaningful to them, often working with non-professional or first-time models. Every image is created with a strong commitment to authenticity and realism — never digitally generated.

The private archive allows PHOTOSTORIES+ to exist beyond public and commercial constraints. It is an intentionally protected space where stories can remain honest, intimate, and uncompromised — exactly as they are meant to be seen.
PHOTOSTORIES+ is my respectful tribute to the beauty each woman naturally reveals before my lens, both in form and emotion.

Conceived several years ago as an innovative photographic project, PHOTOSTORIES+ has led to numerous successful campaigns. Its distinctive approach has inspired others to explore similar paths — a reflection of the project’s creative strength and of the many stories still waiting to be told.
Thank you sincerely for your support.

Is this porn?
No. This is not porn. PHOTOSTORIES+ is a strictly artistic project that involves nude photography as an art form. The focus remains purely aesthetic and narrative.

How old are the models?
All models participating in this project are adults.

Do models sign a release?
Yes. All models sign a model release.

Do I need to visit the website to experience the full project?
Yes. While the eBook stands as a complete collector’s piece, the PHOTOSTORIES+ private archive contains exclusive galleries and videos that significantly expand each story.

project.name: Artistic Nude and Boudoir Photobook - Yoana 2
project.description: Artistic nudes and boudoir: Softbook, Digital photos, and eBook.

creator.name: Juan
creator.biography: Hi. I’m Juan Cruz. I was born and raised in the Dominican Republic and I’m a freelance photographer, cinematographer and editor based in New York City. On the photography side I specialize on head shots, conceptual, family, maternity, erotic and individual photo shoots. On the video side, weddings, sweet 16, birthdays and infomercial.

texte:
Hi everyone. This is Yoana, a 27-year-old Dominican amateur model. I'm sure you remember her from last year campaign and her first campaign. This is the 4th time I work with her and we did this photoshoot a couple of hours before my flight back home.

This campaign will have 150+ photos in color and a 60 page eBook and physical book (magazine). If you already own rewards from her 2023 and 2025 campaigns, then you can get any of these rewards:

eBook - $20
eBook and Photo Set - $50
Photobook + eBook + Photo Set - $80

If you want to get some or all of her rewards from previous campaign, please select them at the "add-ons" while making your pledge.

Below  you can see samples of what you will get. Please note that these photos are in low quality and censored for publication purposes. Send me an email or message if you would like to see them uncensored.
Thank you for your support!

Why I need the money? Your contribution will help me pay the models and all the expenses I had for this photo shoot.

How old are the models? All models participating in this project are 18 years old or older.

Do models sign a model release? Yes, all models participating in this project sign a model release.

Is this porn? Absolutely not. There is no sex or penetration of any kind. I see nudity as an art. Please Keep in mind that most photos are uncensored, but absolutely no pornography.

Printed Softcover Photobook:  It's a softcover photobook/magazine, 8.5x11 inches, 60 pages in color. The reason I chose magazine, and not hardcover book, is because a magazine is less expensive to make, print and ship. It still has very good quality and the photos looks amazing.

Delivering the rewards: I will send the rewards to the email  associated with your kickstarter account. The link to download the rewards will expire after a couple of days  you receive it. If you want  me to send the link to a different email I will gladly do it. Just  send me a message with the new email after you pledge for a reward. Please understand that for security reasons I can't keep the link permanent. After sending rewards and moving to a different campaign, I cannot guarantee delivery of rewards weeks or months after sending the first email. If for any reason you didn't receive the email or can't download the rewards please contact me asap.

International Backers: Delivering physical rewards to countries outside of United States is extremely expensive. My suggestion for you is to use a freight forwarder like VIABOX, FISHISFAST, SHIPITO (among others, check your country first), that way I can ship it to freight forwarder address in the United States and the cost for you will be much lower. If you need more information about freight forwarder, please contact me before backing this project.
If you still want the book shipped using the regular USPS services, I included the option as well. The price for shipping to other countries is $45 dollars.

project.name: OBX Print + Frame - Bring Home the Beauty of the Coast
project.description: An online print shop featuring vibrant film photographs by local artists, bringing curated pieces of coastal imagery to you.

creator.name: Amaris Hames
creator.biography: Portrait photographer who enjoys sassy people and chasing wide open sky.

texte: It's true, there is something special about the Outer Banks. Come across the bridge into Manteo, and it's as if you've paused time. Many of the stores and tack shops look just like they did 30 years ago, run by the same families. It's one of the last standing havens of a simpler life, where technology barely makes a dent in the everyday, and folks are encouraged to slow down and connect.

Our team is composed of photographers from North Carolina, and we’ve spent our whole lives coming back to this coastline. Capturing it on film - the dunes, lighthouses, piers, and shops - was a natural next step. After a while, we had this collection unlike anything we've yet to find elsewhere.
Like most things in the OBX, when you find something good, you share it with your neighbors.

The result is a print shop featuring fine art prints, canvas pieces, and frames - available to anyone who loves this beautiful piece of earth! Each piece is designed to bring that sense of calm, wonder, and natural beauty into your home, no matter where you live.

With your help, we can scale our printing capabilities, collaborate with more local makers, and expand our collection of imagery. Your support directly strengthens local partnerships and allows us to continue commissioning new works, sourcing locally, and investing in the community that inspires us.

A portion of every sale goes directly to local organizations focused on preservation, youth programs, and local initiatives that keep our coastal towns thriving. When you back this project, you’re not just buying art for your home. You're helping us uplift local artists and empower community nonprofits - all by carrying a piece of coastal beauty into your everyday life.
Thank you for helping us turn art into impact by bringing home the beauty of the coast.

project.name: Where the Eye Leads: A #Make100 Photobook
project.description: Two African women exploring life, discovering self, and refining taste through photography and travel

creator.name: Tolu
creator.biography: An adventurer on an unending quest for novelty.

texte: Where the Eye Leads is a photobook that celebrates the beauty of the unconventional path. Through a series of curated photographs paired with personal stories, we invite you into our journey of discovery, creative growth, and learning to trust intuition.

This book is an intimate conversation between two friends, their cameras, and the world around them. It's about finding extraordinary moments in ordinary places, and discovering who you are when you take the road less traveled.

We're two friends who connect over many things, including a shared love of photography and travel. Over the years, our cameras have taken us from the historical streets of Singapore to the vast landscapes of Kenya, from intricate Turkish patterns to quiet neighborhood corners. We're not professional photographers, we are simply people who fell in love with seeing, and want to share what we've learned about vision, growth, and the beauty of trusting where your eye leads you.
Photography changed how we see the world and expanded how we see ourselves.

It's started sometime in 2016 — in Kenya for Keno and in Chile for Tolu. Something clicked when we saw the kinds of photos we were taking. We gravitated toward things we couldn't quite explain: the symmetry of building facades in Singapore, the way light hit a landscape at golden hour, murals that stopped us in our tracks, the peaceful contrast of greenery against urban chaos.

Over the years, as we traveled through different countries and seasons of life, we realized our photographs were documenting more than places; they were mapping our own evolution. Each image represents a moment when we listened to our inner voice, trusted what drew our attention, and captured it. Through the lens, we trained our eyes. Through travel, we discovered (and are still discovering) ourselves.
Where the Eye Leads will be a beautifully designed photography book featuring:

Our goal with this project is to create something that helps others feel less alone in their own unconventional journeys. Whether you're navigating your own path, questioning traditional milestones, or simply learning to trust your creative instincts, we hope this book resonates with you.

project.name: Obsydian Form
project.description: OBSIDIAN FORM – A Study in Contrast

creator.name: Ethan Thomas
creator.biography:
I am a 36-year-old portrait photographer currently based in Poland. For over a decade, I have dedicated myself to capturing the human form through my lens, developing a distinctive artistic vision that celebrates the inherent beauty and grace of the feminine form.
I specialize in tasteful nude and semi-nude photography, approaching my craft with profound respect for my subjects and an unwavering commitment to artistic excellence. Through my work, I explore the intersection of vulnerability and strength, shadow and light, creating images that honor the natural elegance of the human body while maintaining the highest standards of professionalism and artistic integrity.
Throughout my ten-year career, I have cultivated a reputation for creating a comfortable, respectful environment that allows my subjects to express their authentic selves. My portfolio reflects a deep appreciation for the subtle nuances of form, composition, and emotion that define exceptional portrait work.
I am driven by an artistic passion that views photography as both craft and calling. I continue to push creative boundaries while honoring the trust placed in me by those who choose to collaborate in my artistic vision. My work stands as a testament to the power of photography to capture not just images, but the essence of human beauty and dignity.
Working with the beauty of the feminine form is not just my profession—it is my passion, and every photograph I create reflects this deep artistic commitment.

project.name: Make 100% ORIZZONTI
project.description: HORIZONS - SKY & CLOUDS

creator.name: Marzia Lodi
creator.biography:
“Design thinking made visual”
Architetto di formazione, fin dalla laurea si è occupata della produzione di eventi culturali e progetti legati alla creatività ed ai linguaggi di oggi, tenendo conto dello scenario in continua mutazione e dei nuovi strumenti di comunicazione che determinano gli elementi della cultura contemporanea.

texte: 100% ORIZZONTI – SKY & CLOUDS. Atlante visivo del cielo contemporaneo.

Orizzonti – Sky & Clouds è un progetto fotografico modulare composto da 100 immagini originali, realizzate nel corso di diversi viaggi e attraversamenti geografici. Le fotografie sono scattate prevalentemente da una prospettiva aerea o rivolte verso orizzonti aperti senza confini definiti. Il cielo, le nuvole e le continue variazioni cromatiche dell’atmosfera diventano al tempo stesso soggetto, linguaggio e spazio narrativo, configurandosi come un atlante visivo che racconta il transito, la sospensione e la dimensione immateriale dell’orizzonte contemporaneo.

Le fotografie non documentano un luogo specifico, ma costruiscono uno spazio mentale e simbolico: un orizzonte globale che invita lo spettatore a una lettura personale, contemplativa e proiettata nel futuro.

100 immagini: ogni fotografia è unica e irripetibile, anche nelle loro somiglianze, le foto mostrano sempre variazioni di luce, colore e densità, restituendo l’idea di uno spazio in continuo movimento. L’assenza di riferimenti territoriali espliciti trasforma il cielo in un luogo universale, capace di superare confini geografici e culturali. Orizzonti in continua trasformazione, cieli, nuvole e tramonti si trasformano liberamente in immagini fluide, eteree, creando un’estetica che passa dal figurativo all’astratto senza dover rispondere a nessuna regola stilistica precisa.
Le nuvole, per loro natura mutevoli e instabili, diventano metafora del nostro tempo: transizione, mutabilità, cambiamento.
Supporti di stampa e formati disponibili
Le opere sono progettate per una fruizione flessibile e scalabile, in grado di adattarsi a contesti espositivi diversi, quali abitazioni private, uffici e spazi professionali.
Le immagini verranno stampate su tela con frame “al vivo” ideale per eventuali composizioni e pronte per essere allestite nei vostri ambienti.
Per scelta personale, le stampe sono realizzate in formato quadrato, con le seguenti misure disponibili: •20×20cm  •30×30cm  •40×40cm  •50×50cm  •60×60cm
• Eventuali altre dimensioni personalizzabili su richiesta.
100% ORIZZONTI – SKY & CLOUDS: scegli le tue immagini preferite!

Le immagini sono numerate da 1 a 100. Ogni composizione può essere costruita liberamente, selezionando le fotografie in base alle proprie preferenze, indicando i numeri delle immagini prescelte. In questo modo, ogni allestimento diventa unico e irripetibile.
Destinazioni e contesti
Orizzonti – Sky & Clouds è pensato per:
• spazi espositivi e gallerie - ambienti privati e committenze su misura
• aeroporti, stazioni, luoghi di transito - hotel, spazi corporate, studi professionali
La scelta del formato quadrato rende il progetto particolarmente adatto a contesti contemporanei in cui l’immagine dialoga con lo spazio e con il tempo di attraversamento dello spettatore.

project.description: fine art photobook and photosets

creator.name: Obturador Silencioso
creator.biography: Boudoir photographer for 8 years, I like to portray the beauty of the human body

texte: The idea of ​​the project is to carry out a photo shoot with the model Lucy Hernandez while she is covered in chocolate. This artistic project with chocolate is direct and focused on the body as a visual structure.
Created for adult audiences, this project speaks to those who value atmosphere, subtle sensuality, and visual storytelling rooted in mood rather than spectacle.
The imagery is sensual yet restrained, focused on light, texture, composition, and contrast. Each photograph is created with intention, inviting slow viewing rather than quick consumption.
This photography was made for my and is the principal idea.
Another Pictures of our next model

project.name: A Loud Silence
project.description: A photo documentary on mental illness, substance use disorder, homelessness, and survival using candid and composed imagery.

creator.name: J. Valencia
creator.biography: J. Valencia is a Mexican-American Photographer and creative based from the San Francisco Bay Area. Valencia was born in San Jose, Ca, in 1989 into a rough childhood and neighborhood filled with burglary, theft, and ongoing gang violence. With that in mind, Valencia aims to turn struggles into artistic expressions by creating powerful visual connections between people and their surroundings as poetically embedded as possible through photography.

texte: This project is a raw, unflinching photographic documentary capturing lives often ignored or erased: people struggling with mental illness, substance use, and homelessness. The images reveal the tension between visibility and neglect — lives lived in plain sight yet pushed to society’s margins. Some moments are candid, some composed, but all seek to confront the viewer with the reality of these experiences without sensationalizing them.

Through the line of this work, the viewer witnesses both vulnerability and quiet resilience, the small gestures, routines, and interactions that reveal the humanity often overlooked by society. The photographs explore not only individual struggles but also the systemic forces — economic inequality, social stigma, and gaps in care — that shape these lives. Each image is an invitation to look closer, to confront discomfort, and to reflect on how society enables or ignores these realities and above all, empathy.

gone.name: Digital Copy of Stones for White Roses
gone.desc:
Dive into the raw, candid streets of Japan with Stones for White Roses, a photographic journey capturing unguarded moments, fleeting emotions, and the human stories that often go unnoticed. This digital edition delivers the full book in a high-resolution PDF, perfect for reading on your tablet, computer, or e-reader.

All backers at this level will receive a private download link via Kickstarter message once the campaign begins, ensuring you get the complete book safely and securely. You’ll experience the full emotional intensity and unflinching humanity of the series, without spoilers during the campaign.

Join this journey and become part of bringing these hidden stories to light — because every backer helps make Stones for White Roses possible.

comments.text: Cette personne a annulé son engagement.

replies.text: Thank you so much, Henry! Your support truly means a lot to me. My work has always been about capturing the real human experience — the good, the bad, and the uncomfortable — and having someone believe in that vision makes it feel worthwhile. At the end of the day, I just want this work to create awareness and remind people that there is still room for empathy and compassion. I want to help others be heard. The world doesn’t always have to be a scary place. And I will keep in contact with you and save your email. Thanks so much!

comments.text: Thank you for doing this project and bringing to light the struggles! I am a recovering addict, 25 years sober! I am happy to support your project and I hope this project reaches its goal!!

replies.text: Thank you Wayne And congratulations on 25 years! That's very brave of you as well. My approach to this project comes from personal experiences as well and with care and compassion. Thanks for the positivity and support my friend.

comments.text: Cette personne a annulé son engagement.

replies.text: Thank you so much Francis! I put a lot of effort in my photography. Many years of experience and thoughtful planning in every project. Your kind words and support makes projects like these completely possible and worth the work. I'll keep in touch with you Francis. Thanks again!

project.name: Nityk: Portable Solar Coffee Maker with 15,000mAh Power Bank
project.description: Coffee & Tea Maker | Capsules & Ground Coffee Brew | 15,000mAh Swappable Power Bank | 60W Type-C | Airplane-Safe | Solar Powered |

creator.name: Nityk
creator.biography:
At Nityk, we believe great coffee should never be limited by location. Our team of designers and engineers came together to create a portable brewing system that combines high-pressure performance, smart energy, and solar power in one compact device.

Nityk is designed to fit seamlessly into your life, whether you are working, traveling, or outdoors. From early mornings to long journeys, it delivers coffee, tea, and hot water whenever you need it.

Driven by quality, reliability, and thoughtful design, our mission is simple: to create practical, innovative tools that elevate everyday moments and are built to be trusted.

node.name: BackerLead: Keep up with leading idea

texte: For coffee and tea lovers, great taste is not optional. Nityk was created to remove the limits of traditional brewing, delivering real espresso quality without bulky gear, constant access to power, or repeated trips to cafés that cost time and money. It brings your daily ritual wherever life takes you.

With 20-bar pressure, Nityk brews rich espresso from capsules or ground coffee, supports tea brewing and water boiling, and runs on a 15,000mAh swappable battery that delivers up to 20 cups per charge. USB-C fast charging up to 60W, solar-powered recharging, a smart display, and power bank capability make Nityk a compact, all-in-one brewing system built for true independence.

Nityk is engineered to handle the full brewing process with precision and control. The 120 ml water tank is optimized for espresso extraction and tea brewing, allowing you to boil water directly inside the device before brewing. Adjustable temperature control from 85°C to 95°C ensures ideal conditions for both coffee and tea.

With 20-bar high pressure, Nityk extracts maximum aroma and crema from capsules or ground coffee, delivering consistent results cup after cup. From heating to brewing, everything happens in one compact system, making fresh coffee or tea simple, efficient, and reliable wherever you are.

Nityk fits seamlessly into every part of your day. Whether you are camping outdoors, exploring off-grid locations, working at the office, commuting in your car, staying active at the gym, or traveling by airplane, Nityk brings your favorite coffee or tea wherever you go.

Its compact, self-powered design removes the need to search for cafés or rely on disposable options. By brewing on demand, Nityk saves you time and helps reduce daily takeaway costs. One device replaces multiple routines, delivering consistent taste and freedom in any environment.

Nityk is a true multi-purpose brewer designed to adapt to your taste and your lifestyle. Brew rich espresso using coffee capsules, enjoy the aroma of freshly ground coffee, or prepare tea and hot water with the same compact device. Thoughtfully engineered for flexibility and ease of use, Nityk replaces multiple tools with one smart solution, giving you complete freedom to enjoy your favorite drinks anytime, anywhere.

Detach the bottom section of Nityk and remove the brewing parts. Insert a coffee capsule, or add ground coffee or tea into the brewing chamber. The modular design makes preparation quick and intuitive, giving you full flexibility with every brew.

After adding water, close the top of Nityk and press and hold 3sec the power button. The water starts boiling, and once the ideal temperature is reached, Nityk automatically begins the espresso extraction process. Freshly brewed coffee or tea flows directly into your cup, showing the full brewing process in real time.

Nityk is designed for effortless brewing. In just 3–4 simple steps and within 4–5 minutes, you can enjoy a freshly brewed coffee or tea anywhere. No complex settings, no learning curve, just press a button and enjoy your drink.

Designed for outdoor life, Nityk lets you enjoy real coffee and tea far beyond power outlets. The integrated solar panel, with a peak output of up to 1400mAh, helps recharge the battery using sunlight, providing valuable energy support during camping, hiking, and off-grid adventures.

Its powerful 15,000mAh battery delivers up to 20 cups of coffee or tea on a single charge, while solar charging can boost battery capacity in extreme conditions where access to electricity is limited. Compact and easy to carry, Nityk fits effortlessly into your backpack and is ready wherever your journey takes you.

Beyond brewing, Nityk is built to keep you powered outdoors. Its detachable 15,000mAh battery can be removed and used independently, giving you flexible energy wherever you are. The battery module also features its own integrated solar panel, allowing you to recharge using sunlight when outlets are unavailable.

With a 60W USB-C fast charging port, Nityk can quickly power smartphones, GPS devices, cameras, and other essential gear while you’re camping or exploring off-grid. One compact system delivers both fresh coffee and reliable energy, so you stay prepared, connected, and comfortable in the outdoors.

To complete the experience, Nityk features a smart display that guides you through every step. It clearly shows the heating and boiling progress, then seamlessly transitions into the brewing stage, so you always know exactly what’s happening.

In just 5 to 7 minutes, Nityk delivers a hot, rich, and perfectly brewed espresso even in outdoor conditions. No guessing, no waiting around. Just clear feedback, precise control, and café-quality coffee wherever your adventure takes you.

Turn your car into your personal coffee station. With Nityk, you can easily charge the device while driving and brew fresh coffee or tea on the go. No detours, no waiting in lines, and no overpriced roadside drinks.

Whether you’re commuting to work or heading out on a long trip, Nityk saves you time and money by delivering real espresso exactly when you want it. Plug in, brew, and enjoy the comfort of fresh coffee—right from the driver’s seat.

Work hard. Recover smarter.
After an intense workout, your body deserves the right refill. With Nityk, enjoy freshly brewed, toning coffee or tea right after training to support focus, recovery, and energy balance.

While you recharge yourself, Nityk recharges your gear. Its 15,000mAh battery and 60W USB-C fast charging keep your phone powered up, so you leave the gym energized, connected, and ready for what’s next. No queues, no café stops, just smart recovery on your terms.

With Nityk’s built-in timer function, you can set your brew in advance, focus fully on your cardio or workout session, and let Nityk handle the rest. When you’re done training, your freshly brewed coffee or tea is ready right on time.
No waiting, no distractions, just a smooth transition from effort to reward. Set the timer, move your body, and enjoy your drink exactly when you need it.

Designed for modern workspaces, Nityk makes tea brewing simple, precise, and efficient. Just add loose tea leaves, fill the water tank, and press the button. The smart heating system brings water to the optimal temperature and begins brewing automatically.

With controlled heating, a 120 ml water tank, and intelligent temperature management, Nityk prepares properly brewed tea in under 5 minutes hot, aromatic, and ready to drink without interrupting your workflow. The smart display keeps you informed throughout the heating and brewing process.
No kettle, no waiting, and no disposable cups. Nityk delivers fresh, correctly brewed tea directly at your desk, saving time while elevating your everyday tea ritual.

With a single charge delivering up to 20 cups, Nityk helps you stay focused throughout the day while cutting down daily takeaway costs. More productivity, more savings, and great taste without ever leaving your desk.

Nityk is designed around a swappable 15,000mAh battery system that keeps you moving without interruptions. When the battery runs low, simply detach it and replace it with a fully charged one no downtime, no waiting, no compromise. Just swap and continue brewing instantly.

Each battery module is a powerhouse on its own. It features an integrated solar panel, allowing you to recharge anywhere, and a USB-C port with up to 60W fast charging, so the same battery can power Nityk or charge your devices. One smart module. Multiple uses. Total freedom wherever you are.

Beyond brewing coffee or tea, Nityk’s detachable battery works as a full-featured 15,000mAh power bank. Equipped with a USB-C port, it delivers fast, reliable power to your phone, laptop, or other everyday gadgets right when you need it.
Whether you are working, traveling, or outdoors, the same battery that powers your brew keeps your devices charged and ready. One smart battery. Two essential roles. No extra power banks to carry.

Nityk is designed to travel with you without restrictions. Its 15,000mAh battery capacity complies with airline carry-on regulations, so you can bring it on board with confidence and enjoy your favorite coffee or tea during the flight.

Instead of relying on limited or overpriced onboard options, Nityk lets you brew your own espresso exactly the way you like it, even while traveling. As more airlines move away from complimentary beverages, Nityk helps you save money, skip expensive inflight drinks, and enjoy real taste at 30,000 feet.
Travel smarter, fly comfortably, and never compromise on your coffee ritual again.

Every reliable product is built through careful iteration, testing, and refinement. The development of Nityk began with early concept sketches and functional layouts, focused on portability, energy efficiency, and real-world usability. From the start, our goal was not just to design a coffee maker, but to engineer a system that could perform consistently in everyday and outdoor conditions.

Over time, we developed and tested multiple prototypes, refining everything from internal mechanics and brewing pressure to battery integration, solar performance, and user interface layout. Each prototype allowed us to evaluate ergonomics, material choices, durability, and ease of use, helping us identify what worked best and what needed improvement.

This iterative process ensured that Nityk evolved from a concept into a practical, well-tested device. The result is a thoughtfully engineered product that balances performance, reliability, and design, built to meet real expectations and ready for the next stage of production.

gone.name: Nityk Compo Perk
gone.desc:
☕🧳 Nityk Travel Bundle. Brew AnywhereㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤGet the complete setup with Nityk portable coffee maker and travel case, designed for everyday use, travel, and outdoor adventures. Brew espresso, coffee, or tea wherever you are, without cafés, bulky machines, or waiting in line.ㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤ⚡ Power, Performance & Protection
Nityk delivers 20-bar pressure, brews up to 20 cups per charge, and runs on a 15,000mAh swappable battery. With USB-C fast charging up to 60W and solar-assisted charging, you stay powered anywhere. The included travel case keeps your Nityk protected and ready to go at all times.

options.name: 1-Year Extra Warranty
options.desc:
Enjoy added confidence with an extra 1-year warranty on top of the standard 12-month coverage for your Nityk coffee maker. This extension gives you a full 24 months of protection, ensuring long-term reliability, dedicated support, and worry-free use wherever you brew.

☕ Designed to protect your daily ritual, this warranty helps you focus on enjoying great coffee and tea while we take care of the rest. Extra coverage, extra peace of mind. ✨

options.name: Nityk Magnetic 120W Type-C Cable
options.desc:
A clean setup starts with the right cable. The Nityk 120W Magnetic Type-C Cable is an essential accessory for your gadgets and everyday charging needs.

⚡ Delivering up to 120W fast charging, it powers your Nityk and other Type-C devices quickly, reliably, and efficiently.

🧲 The magnetic design keeps your workspace neat and organized, snapping into place instantly and preventing tangled or messy cables, whether at home, in the office, or on the go.

✨ Fast, tidy, and dependable. One cable that upgrades both your charging speed and your setup.

options.name: Nityk Foldable Stand
options.desc:
Designed to perfectly match Nityk, the foldable stand adds comfort, stability, and style wherever you brew. Its fold-flat design makes it easy to carry, store, and set up in seconds.

🏢 Perfect for Office & Workspace
On your desk or in shared workspaces, the stand positions Nityk at a comfortable height, keeps your setup organized, and creates a clean, modern coffee corner that fits beautifully into any interior.

🏕️ Ready for Outdoor Use
Outdoors or while traveling, the stand provides a stable base on uneven surfaces, making brewing easier during camping and adventures.

✨ Practical, Portable, and Elegant
A simple accessory that improves usability at work, enhances aesthetics at home, and adds stability outdoors.

options.name: Extra 15,000mAh Battery
options.desc:
🔋⚡Never stop brewing. The extra 15,000mAh swappable battery gives you instant backup power whenever you need it most.

☕ Brew up to 20 cups of coffee or tea on a single charge and keep going even on long trips, outdoor adventures, or busy workdays. When one battery runs low, simply swap it out and continue using Nityk in seconds. No waiting, no interruptions.

🌞 Designed for real-world use, the battery features an integrated solar panel to boost energy in outdoor or off-grid conditions, plus a 60W USB-C port for fast recharging and powering your devices when needed.

🚀 More freedom, more flexibility, and complete energy independence. One extra battery means your coffee ritual never has to pause.

options.name: Nityk Travel Case
options.desc:
Keep your Nityk perfectly organized wherever your day takes you. This compact and durable travel case is designed to securely carry your Nityk coffee and tea maker along with all essential accessories.

☕ Inside, there is dedicated space for your foldable stand, additional battery, coffee capsules, ground coffee or tea, and all detachable parts needed for brewing. Everything stays protected, neatly arranged, and easy to access.

✈️ Whether you are traveling, commuting, camping, or working on the go, the Nityk Travel Case makes transport simple and reliable. One case, everything you need, always ready for your next cup.

options.name: Nityk 100W GaN Charger
options.desc:
⚡Power your Nityk at full speed. The Nityk 100W GaN Charger is engineered to recharge your Nityk in as little as 20 minutes, so you spend less time waiting and more time brewing.

🔌 Equipped with 3 USB-C and 1 USB-A port, it lets you charge your Nityk and other devices at the same time with exceptional speed and reliability. Perfect for phones, tablets, laptops, and accessories, all from one compact charger.

🌍 Designed for global travel and daily use, you will be able to choose between EU/UK or US plug versions during the post-campaign survey. One charger, maximum performance, anywhere you go.

options.name: Nityk Coffee Grinder
options.desc:
Fresh coffee starts with the perfect grind. The Nityk Coffee Grinder is a compact, portable companion designed for coffee lovers who want full control over flavor, anywhere they go.

🔋 Powered by a 7,000mAh built-in battery, it delivers long-lasting performance for multiple grinding sessions on a single charge, perfect for home, office, travel, or outdoor use.

With adjustable grind levels, you can easily choose your preferred grind size, from fine espresso to coarser brews, matching your coffee style every time.

✨ Portable, powerful, and precise. Nityk Grinder gives you freshly ground coffee whenever inspiration strikes.

options.name: 1-Year Extra Warranty

Enjoy added confidence with an extra 1-year warranty on top of the standard 12-month coverage for your Nityk coffee maker. This extension gives you a full 24 months of protection, ensuring long-term reliability, dedicated support, and worry-free use wherever you brew.

☕ Designed to protect your daily ritual, this warranty helps you focus on enjoying great coffee and tea while we take care of the rest. Extra coverage, extra peace of mind. ✨

options.name: Nityk Magnetic 120W Type-C Cable
options.desc:
A clean setup starts with the right cable. The Nityk 120W Magnetic Type-C Cable is an essential accessory for your gadgets and everyday charging needs.

⚡ Delivering up to 120W fast charging, it powers your Nityk and other Type-C devices quickly, reliably, and efficiently.

🧲 The magnetic design keeps your workspace neat and organized, snapping into place instantly and preventing tangled or messy cables, whether at home, in the office, or on the go.

✨ Fast, tidy, and dependable. One cable that upgrades both your charging speed and your setup.

options.name: Nityk Foldable Stand
options.desc:
Designed to perfectly match Nityk, the foldable stand adds comfort, stability, and style wherever you brew. Its fold-flat design makes it easy to carry, store, and set up in seconds.

🏢 Perfect for Office & Workspace
On your desk or in shared workspaces, the stand positions Nityk at a comfortable height, keeps your setup organized, and creates a clean, modern coffee corner that fits beautifully into any interior.

🏕️ Ready for Outdoor Use
Outdoors or while traveling, the stand provides a stable base on uneven surfaces, making brewing easier during camping and adventures.

✨ Practical, Portable, and Elegant
A simple accessory that improves usability at work, enhances aesthetics at home, and adds stability outdoors.

options.name: Extra 15,000mAh Battery
options.desc:
🔋⚡Never stop brewing. The extra 15,000mAh swappable battery gives you instant backup power whenever you need it most.

☕ Brew up to 20 cups of coffee or tea on a single charge and keep going even on long trips, outdoor adventures, or busy workdays. When one battery runs low, simply swap it out and continue using Nityk in seconds. No waiting, no interruptions.

🌞 Designed for real-world use, the battery features an integrated solar panel to boost energy in outdoor or off-grid conditions, plus a 60W USB-C port for fast recharging and powering your devices when needed.

🚀 More freedom, more flexibility, and complete energy independence. One extra battery means your coffee ritual never has to pause.

options.name: Nityk Travel Case
options.desc:
Keep your Nityk perfectly organized wherever your day takes you. This compact and durable travel case is designed to securely carry your Nityk coffee and tea maker along with all essential accessories.

☕ Inside, there is dedicated space for your foldable stand, additional battery, coffee capsules, ground coffee or tea, and all detachable parts needed for brewing. Everything stays protected, neatly arranged, and easy to access.

✈️ Whether you are traveling, commuting, camping, or working on the go, the Nityk Travel Case makes transport simple and reliable. One case, everything you need, always ready for your next cup.

options.name: Nityk 100W GaN Charger
options.desc:
⚡Power your Nityk at full speed. The Nityk 100W GaN Charger is engineered to recharge your Nityk in as little as 20 minutes, so you spend less time waiting and more time brewing.

🔌 Equipped with 3 USB-C and 1 USB-A port, it lets you charge your Nityk and other devices at the same time with exceptional speed and reliability. Perfect for phones, tablets, laptops, and accessories, all from one compact charger.

🌍 Designed for global travel and daily use, you will be able to choose between EU/UK or US plug versions during the post-campaign survey. One charger, maximum performance, anywhere you go.

options.name: Nityk Coffee Grinder
options.desc:
Fresh coffee starts with the perfect grind. The Nityk Coffee Grinder is a compact, portable companion designed for coffee lovers who want full control over flavor, anywhere they go.

🔋 Powered by a 7,000mAh built-in battery, it delivers long-lasting performance for multiple grinding sessions on a single charge, perfect for home, office, travel, or outdoor use.

With adjustable grind levels, you can easily choose your preferred grind size, from fine espresso to coarser brews, matching your coffee style every time.

✨ Portable, powerful, and precise. Nityk Grinder gives you freshly ground coffee whenever inspiration strikes.

project.name: World’s First 60W Pocket Cloud: Backup Fast, Charge Faster
project.description: An ultra-compact, fashionable, Apple-certified backup hub with swappable microSD expansion and 60W PD charging

creator.name: Conner
creator.biography:
Conner was once a defining name in digital storage. During the 1980s and 1990s, Conner led the industry as the dominant standard for 3.5-inch hard drives, helping fuel the global adoption of personal computers. By 1990, Conner Peripherals became the fastest-growing startup in U.S. commercial history, setting benchmarks for performance, reliability, and compact engineering that influenced generations of storage technology.

Today, Conner is reborn for a new era. Building on decades of innovation, the revitalized Conner brand combines its rich engineering heritage with modern industrial design and integrated artificial intelligence to create a new generation of small, portable digital storage solutions. These products are designed for today’s highly mobile, data-driven world—supporting creators, professionals, and everyday users who demand speed, security, and reliability wherever they go.

Conner’s return is driven by evolution, not nostalgia. By rethinking how personal data is stored, managed, and accessed, Conner is redefining portable storage for the age of mobility and AI.

In 2026, Conner proudly reintroduces itself on the global stage at CES in Central Hall, showcasing its latest technologies and signaling the beginning of a bold new chapter—one that carries the spirit of its legacy forward while powering the future of digital storage.

titre: 🔌Instant Plug-and-Backup — Save your phone in seconds
📲 Smart Backup App — Simple, Powerful, Reliable
🎥4K Direct Recording — Capture straight to the card
Direct Playback — No need to copy files back to your phone
💻Truly universal — Works with iPhone, Android, iPad, Windows, Mac
Transparent “Tech-core” Exterior — Made for people who love gadgets
Why Pocket Cloud beats traditional portable storage?
texte: You’re traveling, filming, capturing moments you don’t want to lose.
Then suddenly — Storage Full.
You’re forced to delete memories, wait for slow cloud uploads,
or miss the moment entirely.
Now let’s take a closer look at what makes Pocket Cloud your most reliable OTG (on-the-go) storage companion — and why you’ll never want to back up your phone any other way again.
Pocket Cloud is Apple MFi certified, ensuring safe, stable, and fully compatible operation with iPhone and iPad.
Pocket Cloud supports Lightning iPhones via the included Lightning connector.
Fully Apple MFi certified for safe, stable backups — no pop-ups, no disconnects.
Still on Lightning?
You don’t need to upgrade your phone to upgrade your storage.
Dual-Port Data & Power Transfer
Pocket Cloud features a dual-port USB-C design with data transfer and PD passthrough charging, allowing you to back up your files while keeping your phone powered — from either direction.
Pocket Cloud supports full-speed 60W PD passthrough charging,
so your phone stays powered while backing up or recording.
Pocket Cloud automatically backs up your photos, videos, contacts, and albums.
No Wi-Fi. No waiting. No recurring fees.
Pocket Cloud comes with a dedicated backup app
built to protect your data — properly.
Photos, videos, dates, locations, filenames — nothing gets lost.
Back up one album or your entire phone — your choice.
Never worry about storage again.
Supports microSD / SDXC cards up to 2TB.
When one card is full, swap it out and keep going.
Record 4K at 60FPS or extended timelapses directly to the microSD card.
Your phone’s internal storage stays free, so you can shoot longer, smoother, and without interruptions — finally built for creators who don’t want to stop mid-recording.
Powered by USB 3.2 Gen1, Pocket Cloud reaches up to 104 MB/s.
Transfer thousands of photos or large 4K files in minutes.
Creators can import directly into Final Cut Pro / Premiere Pro.
Watch movies, view photos, listen to audio directly from the card.
Perfect for flights, travel, and offline entertainment.
Use one device for all your digital ecosystems.
Back up your phone, transfer to your PC, watch on your tablet.
Lightning iPhones don’t power accessories.
How to use:
Plug Pocket Cloud into a charger
Connect to your iPhone with a C-to-Lightning cable
That’s it. Backup works normally.
USB-C phones can power Pocket Cloud directly.
How to use:
Connect Pocket Cloud to your phone with a C-to-C cable
No charger needed
Instant access and backup.
Most Android phones and computers work instantly with Pocket Cloud — just plug in and go.
A fully transparent shell that showcases the technology inside —inspired by classic clear tech from the 90s and 2000s.
Barely heavier than a coin.
Fits in any pocket, wallet, or keychain pouch.

The estimated shipping time is in Mar. The goods are all delivered by ship and air. And after the campaign ends, you will receive a PledgeBox email to select your final order choices and pay the shipping costs. Following is a list of rough estimates for delivering the base pledges.
Reminder: These are just estimate and the accurate costs will be calculated in the PledgeBox survey we sent according to your address and your pledges.

Each order will ship to only one location. There will be no split orders even for the largest shipments including multiple sets. So if you buy for friends you will need to pick one location that works for everyone.
With 10+ years of manufacturing experience in storage hardware,
we developed Pocket Cloud from early sketches to mass production validation,
refining every detail to ensure reliability and durability.
Conner was once a pioneer of digital storage.
In the 1980s and 1990s, it set the standard for 3.5-inch hard drives, helping power the global rise of personal computers and becoming the fastest-growing startup in U.S. commercial history by 1990.
Today, Conner returns for a new era.
Built on decades of engineering expertise, the brand combines its storage heritage with modern design and intelligent technology to create a new generation of compact, portable storage solutions.
Designed for a mobile, data-driven world, Conner’s products support creators, professionals, and everyday users who need fast, reliable storage wherever they go.
Conner’s comeback is about evolution, not nostalgia — redefining personal storage for the age of mobility and AI.
In 2026, Conner marks this new chapter at CES, signaling a bold future for portable digital storage.
Memories shouldn’t be deleted.
Storage shouldn’t be rented.
Your data should always be yours.
Back Pocket Cloud today — and own your digital freedom.
